j93m.Name: Tsunami
j93m.Description:
Channelled: Every 0.5 seconds for 2.5 seconds.

Consumes 5 Blade Energy.
Move as an unrelenting tsunami, drowning your target under the waves of your attacks, each dealing %0.0f physical damage. While channeling, your movement speed is increased by 20% , and if your channel is interrupted you are refunded any unused energy.

Spirit Blade bonus: %0.0f physical damage.

N92m.Name: Soothing Spring
N92m.Description:
Consumes 2 Blade Energy.
Your energy replenishes you like a soothing spring. You are instantly healed for 11.5% of your health (up to 1725 ) and cleansed of 1 detrimental effect. You also gain a beneficial effect which restores 1.5% of your health (up to 225 ) and cleanses 1 detrimental effect every 0.5 seconds for 6 seconds.

Additionally, your teammembers are cleansed of 1 detrimental effect every 2 seconds for 6 seconds.

This ability does not trigger and is not affected by global recharge time.

n93m.Name: Rushing River
n93m.Description:
Column Dash: Dash forward 10 metres, affecting up to 6 enemies in a 6 metre wide column along the way.

Consumes 2 Blade Energy.
Rush through your enemies like the raging rapids dealing %0.0f physical damage and slowing their movement. Applies Exposed.

Spirit Blade bonus: %0.0f physical damage.

broo.Name: Flowing Strike
broo.Description:
Your blade moves like flowing water, striking your target for %0.0f physical damage.

Spirit Blade bonus: %0.0f physical damage.

Requires a Blade in your Primary Weapon slot.

XF0r.Name: Dancing Blade
XF0r.Description:
Channelled: Every 0.5 seconds for 2.5 seconds.

Consumes 4 Blade Energy.
Your blade dances through the air, cutting at your target's spirit dealing %0.0f physical damage. As you grasp your blade the dance comes to a deadly end, dealing %0.0f physical damage.

This ability has a 15 metre range.

Spirit Blade bonus: %0.0f physical damage.

=F0r.Name: Crushing Tide
=F0r.Description:
Consumes 2 Blade Energy.
Requires Spirit Blade to be forged and have at least 2 attacks remaining. Empower your Spirit Blade with the destructive force of a tsunami making landfall, causing your next Blade attack to shatter the Spirit Blade, dealing %0.0f damage for each remaining attack.

This ability does not trigger and is not affected by global recharge time.

ZF0r.Name: Snake's Bite
ZF0r.Description:
Consumes 2 Blade Energy.
Strike your target with the pommel of your blade, stunning them for 3 seconds. You immediately perform a follow up slash dealing %0.0f physical damage.

Spirit Blade bonus: %0.0f physical damage.

4G0r.Name: Hurricane
4G0r.Description:
PBAoE: Affects up to 6 enemies in a 5 metre radius around you.

Consumes 3 Blade Energy.
Your blade cuts through the air creating gale force winds which deal %0.0f physical damage to nearby enemies.

Spirit Blade bonus: %0.0f physical damage.

aG0r.Name: Supreme Harmony
aG0r.Description:
Consumes 4 Blade Energy.
Achieve complete harmony of body, mind, spirit, and blade for 8 seconds. During this time all of your Blade attacks deal 23% more damage and restore 1.5% of your health. In addition, your movement speed is increased by 20% . Upon activation, you are cleansed of all detrimental effects and gain 2 Chi.

This ability does not trigger and is not affected by global recharge time.

8G0r.Name: Swallow Cut
8G0r.Description:
Consumes 3 Blade Energy.
Perform a quick and precise strike with your blade dealing %0.0f physical damage.

Spirit Blade bonus: %0.0f physical damage.

dG0r.Name: Crescent Fang
dG0r.Description:
PBAoE: Affects up to 6 enemies in a 5 metre radius around you.

Cut a crescent-shaped arc in front of you with your blade dealing %0.0f physical damage to nearby enemies.

Spirit Blade bonus: %0.0f physical damage.

Requires a Blade in your Primary Weapon slot.

jG0r.Name: Typhoon
jG0r.Description:
PBAoE: Affects up to 6 enemies in a 5 metre radius around you.

Consumes 4 Blade Energy.
Embody the destructive nature of a typhoon, lashing out at nearby targets with your blade dealing %0.0f physical damage and stunning them for 1 second.

Like the crushing waves that follow a typhoon, you increase your Blade damage by 6% for each affected enemy, up to a maximum of 30% . This effect lasts 6 seconds.

Spirit Blade bonus: %0.0f physical damage.

fG0r.Name: Tempest
fG0r.Description:
PBAoE: Affects up to 6 enemies in a 5 metre radius around you.

Consumes 5 Blade Energy.
Unleash a storm of blades around you dealing %0.0f physical damage to nearby enemies. A whirling vortex is left in the wake of the blade-storm which deals %0.0f physical damage every 0.5 seconds for 5 seconds to enemies standing in the area.

Spirit Blade bonus: %0.0f physical damage.

U6jz.Name: Hone
U6jz.Description:
Hone your blade and spirit to gain 2 Blade Energy and cause your Blade attacks to have an additional 20% chance to generate Chi for 5 seconds.
Your next Blade attack will purge 1 beneficial effect from all enemies hit.

This ability does not trigger and is not affected by global recharge time.

UCjz.Name: Impale Spirit
UCjz.Description:
Impale Spirit:
Consumes 2 Blade Energy.
Impale your target with a spirit-forged blade dealing %0.0f physical damage and slowing its movement. The wound left by the blade lingers on, dealing %0.0f physical damage every second for 5 seconds.

This ability has a 10 metre range.

Spirit Blade bonus: %0.0f physical damage.

Becomes Exhume Spirit for 5 seconds on a successful hit.

Exhume Spirit:
Slice the air in front of you creating a whirlwind that seeks out the enemy you had impaled. The whirlwind erupts into a violent maelstrom upon reaching its target dealing %0.0f physical damage to the target and nearby enemies. Applies Exposed.

Spirit Blade bonus: %0.0f physical damage.

CEjz.Name: Immortal Spirit
CEjz.Description: Whenever you gain Chi you replenish your spirit, restoring <font color='#00FF33'>1% </font> of your health (up to <font color='#00FF33'>150 </font>) every second for <font color='#FF6600'>3 </font> seconds.

SDjz.Name: Eye of the Storm
SDjz.Description: Your "Hurricane" rages around you, battering your foes with every other hit of this ability for an additional <font color='#FF3D3D'>%0.0f </font> physical damage.

JDjz.Name: Storm Surge
JDjz.Description: The waves of your "Tsunami" swell whenever Chi is generated, dealing an additional <font color='#FF3D3D'>%0.0f </font> physical damage to the target.

FDjz.Name: Keen Edge
FDjz.Description: You "Hone" your blade to a razor sharp edge, increasing your Crit Power with Blade abilities while "Hone" is active by <font color='#FF6600'>40% </font>.

KDjz.Name: Soulforged Blade
KDjz.Description: Your "Dancing Blade" harnesses your soul and the soul of your foe and coalesces into a Spirit Blade upon completion which lasts for <font color='#FF6600'>2 </font> attacks. If you have already forged your Spirit Blade, the number of attacks remaining is increased by <font color='#FF6600'>2 </font>.

TDjz.Name: Second Wave
TDjz.Description: When "Crushing Tide" shatters your Spirit Blade, its recharge timer is reduced by <font color='#FF6600'>1 </font> seconds for each remaining Spirit Blade attack.

UDjz.Name: Meditate
UDjz.Description: You meditate on the essence of a "Soothing Spring." Each time the heal over time effect restores your health, you have an <font color='#FF6600'>18% </font> chance to gain <font color='#FF6600'>1 </font> Chi.

2Ejz.Name: Reversal
2Ejz.Description: Whenever you interrupt an enemy's attack with "Snake's Bite", you reverse the flow of harmful energy and gain <font color='#FF6600'>2 </font> Chi. You also direct some of the energy back at your target dealing an additional <font color='#FF3D3D'>%0.0f </font> physical damage.

3Ejz.Name: Waterfall
3Ejz.Description: Your "Rushing River" cascades like a waterfall into a new flow. If you damage an enemy with "Rushing River" you are able to activate "Rushing River" a second time within <font color='#FF6600'>5 </font> seconds. The damage of this second activation is increased to <font color='#FF3D3D'>%0.0f </font> physical damage.

4Ejz.Name: Master's Focus
4Ejz.Description: When you gain Chi, you focus your senses reducing the remaining recharge time of "Supreme Harmony" by <font color='#FF6600'>5% </font>.

5Ejz.Name: Hardened Blade
5Ejz.Description: Your "Swallow Cut" tempers and hardens your Spirit Blade. Whenever you hit an enemy with "Swallow Cut" you have a <font color='#FF6600'>24% </font> chance to not consume an attack from your Spirit Blade.

6Ejz.Name: Whirlwind
6Ejz.Description: You harness the power of the wind while your "Tempest" blows furiously around you. While you are inside of the ground area of your "Tempest", your Blade attacks deal an additional <font color='#FF3D3D'>%0.0f </font> physical damage to the target and nearby enemies.

7Ejz.Name: Sunder Spirit
7Ejz.Description: Your "Exhume Spirit" tears at the spirit energy of your foes, causing all affected enemies to be dealt <font color='#FF3D3D'>%0.0f </font> physical damage every second for <font color='#FF6600'>5 </font> seconds.

8Ejz.Name: Torrent
8Ejz.Description: The waves of your "Typhoon" come crashing down on your foes with unrelenting force, increasing the damage bonus for each target hit by "Typhoon" to <font color='#FF6600'>9.5% </font> up to a maximum of <font color='#FF6600'>46.5% </font>.

DEjz.Name: Clairvoyance
DEjz.Description: You have sharpened your senses such that you are able to guard yourself preemptively from danger. Whenever you gain a heal over time effect from "Soothing Spring" or "Immortal Spirit" you also gain a barrier that absorbs <font color='#00FF33'>100% </font> of incoming damage and dissipates after absorbing damage equal to <font color='#00FF33'>12.5% </font> of your maximum health (up to <font color='#00FF33'>1875 </font>). This effect can only occur once every <font color='#FF6600'>10 </font> seconds.

EEjz.Name: Measure Twice, Cut Once
EEjz.Description: Each cut of your Blade is a measured and precise action. While in combat, if you have not generated Chi in the past <font color='#FF6600'>4.5 </font> seconds, your next Blade attack will generate <font color='#FF6600'>1 </font> Chi in addition to the normal Chi gain chance.

FEjz.Name: Draw Sword, Draw Blood
FEjz.Description: When you draw your Blade it thirsts to spill blood before being sheathed. Whenever you enter combat, your next <font color='#FF6600'>3 </font> Blade attacks deal <font color='#FF6600'>20% </font> more damage. While in combat, you gain <font color='#FF6600'>1 </font> use of this bonus effect every <font color='#FF6600'>10 </font> seconds.

GEjz.Name: Deluge
GEjz.Description: Striking enemies with your Spirit Blade builds up power inside of your Blade. Every other hit with Spirit Blade active unleashes a flood of power around you dealing <font color='#FF3D3D'>%0.0f </font> physical damage to nearby enemies.

HEjz.Name: Sweeping Slice
HEjz.Description: You have learned techniques for handling multiple enemies with your Blade. Whenever you hit <font color='#FF6600'>2 </font> or more enemies with a single Blade ability you deal an additional <font color='#FF3D3D'>%0.0f </font> physical damage to nearby enemies.

IEjz.Name: Focused Breathing
IEjz.Description: You slow your breathing and focus your mind while in combat allowing you to generate <font color='#FF6600'>1 </font> Chi every <font color='#FF6600'>10 </font> seconds.

KEjz.Name: Resonance
KEjz.Description: Your spirit resonates strongly with your Blade. Whenever you gain Chi, your next Blade attack deals an additional <font color='#FF3D3D'>%0.0f </font> physical damage.

NEjz.Name: Warrior's Spirit
NEjz.Description: Your unyielding warrior spirit endures on even as your Spirit Blade shatters. Whenever your Spirit Blade shatters, you gain <font color='#FF6600'>1 </font> Chi and deal <font color='#FF3D3D'>%0.0f </font> physical damage to nearby enemies.

9Hdo.Name: Smash
9Hdo.Description:
Strike quickly with your hammer dealing %0.0f physical damage.
Generates 5 Rage.

Requires a Hammer in your Primary Weapon slot.

8Ido.Name: Blazing Fury
8Ido.Description:
Signature Ability
PBAoE: Affects up to 6 enemies in a 10 metre radius around you.

Consumes 3 Hammer Energy.
Unleash your rage, creating a blast of flame that incinerates nearby enemies for %0.0f damage and %0.0f damage every second for 12 seconds. You gain %0.0f temporary health and receive 25% more healing for 6 seconds.

Taking damage, successfully mitigating received damage, and Enraging reduce the remaining cooldown time.
This signature ability scales with tanking stats, and shares a cooldown with other signature abilities.

Do5q.Name: Demolish
Do5q.Description:
Consumes 5 Hammer Energy.
Crush your target with the full weight of your hammer dealing %0.0f physical damage.
Generates 25 Rage.

When Enraged: Unleash your anger on your target improving the damage dealt to %0.0f phyiscal damage. Instead of generating Rage, this attack consumes 50 Rage.

bE5q.Name: Blindside
bE5q.Description:
Consumes 2 Hammer Energy.
Shove your target to the ground, purging 1 beneficial effect from them and dealing %0.0f physical damage.
Generates 10 Rage.

nE5q.Name: Seethe
nE5q.Description: Focus your anger to gain <font color='#FF6600'>4 </font> Hammer Energy. This ability does not trigger and is not affected by global recharge time.

qE5q.Name: Ground Pound
qE5q.Description:
PBAoE: Affects up to 6 enemies in a 5 metre radius around you.

Strike the ground with your hammer, sending out shockwaves which deal %0.0f physical damage.
Generates 2 Rage per target hit.

Requires a Hammer in your Primary Weapon slot.

y6bq.Name: Eruption
y6bq.Description:
Column: Affects up to 6 enemies in a 6 metre wide by 9 metre long area in front of you.

Consumes 4 Hammer Energy.
You smash your hammer into the ground, creating a column of molten ground in front of you that sends enemies into the air, purges 1 beneficial effect, and deals %0.0f physical damage. Applies Exposed.
Generates 7 Rage per target hit.

B6bq.Name: Pulverise
B6bq.Description:
Consumes 3 Hammer Energy.
Bash your target with a backhand swing of your hammer dealing %0.0f physical damage.
Generates 18 Rage.

When Enraged: Harness your rage to strengthen yourself increasing your maximum health by 30% for 15 seconds. Instead of generating Rage, this attack consumes 50 Rage.

D6bq.Name: Unstoppable Force
D6bq.Description:
Consumes 4 Hammer Energy.
Become an unstoppable machine of destruction. Grow in size by 25% , deal 20% more damage with Hammer abilities, and generate 3 Rage every second for 8 seconds.

When activated all action and movement restricting effects are removed and you are immune to them for the duration of the effect. This ability does not trigger and is not affected by global recharge time.

E6bq.Name: Enter the Fray
E6bq.Description:
Charge: 15 metre charge to the target. The target must be at least 3 metres away.

Consumes 2 Hammer Energy.
Enter the heat of battle by charging to the target, dealing %0.0f physical damage. For the next 6 seconds, whenever you are hit, you strike back dealing %0.0f physical damage to the attacker.

If your Anima Allocation is at least 51% Survivability, enemies within 5 metres of the target are compelled to attack you.
Generates 10 Rage.

H6bq.Name: Rampage
H6bq.Description:
PBAoE: Affects up to 6 enemies in a 5 metre radius around you.

Consumes 2 Hammer Energy.
Furiously lash out at nearby enemies dealing %0.0f physical damage. Applies Exposed.
Generates 9 Rage per target hit.

K6bq.Name: Razor Shards
K6bq.Description:
PBAoE: Affects up to 6 enemies in a 5 metre radius around you.

Consumes 3 Hammer Energy.
Slam the ground with your hammer, sending razor sharp shards of earth flying in all directions dealing %0.0f physical damage.
Generates 6 Rage per target hit.

When Enraged: Shatter the earth beneath you making larger shards impale affected enemies causing them to take %0.0f physical damage every second for 5 seconds. Instead of generating Rage, this attack consumes 50 Rage.

M6bq.Name: Burning Wrath
M6bq.Description:
PBAoE: Affects up to 6 enemies in a 5 metre radius around you and also pulsing every 0.5 seconds for 5 seconds.

Consumes 5 Hammer Energy.
Manifest your fiery rage dealing %0.0f physical damage. For the next 5 seconds your rage burns nearby enemies dealing %0.0f physical damage.
Generates 8 Rage per target hit by the initial blast.

When Enraged: Your unbridled rage sunders the earth beneath you leaving a damaging area on the ground. Enemies standing in this area have their movement speed slowed and are dealt %0.0f physical damage every 0.5 seconds for 5 seconds. Instead of generating Rage, this attack consumes 50 Rage.

N6bq.Name: Raging Volcano
N6bq.Description:
Channelled: Every 0.5 seconds for 6 seconds.
PBAoE: Affects up to 6 enemies in a 10 metre radius around you.

Consumes 4 Hammer Energy.
Become a fiery whirlwind of destruction dealing %0.0f physical damage per hit while forcing nearby enemies to attack you and slowing their movement. The last hit will deal %0.0f physical damage and apply Debilitated.
While channelling this ability, you gain %i temporary health, your movement speed is increased by 30% and when you are healed you heal again for 85% of the healing received.
Generates 4 Rage per target hit.

5Kjz.Name: Pain Suppression
5Kjz.Description:
Consumes 2 Hammer Energy.
Your anger allows you to fight through the pain for the next 8 seconds. During this time, whenever you are hit, you fight on and heal yourself for 50% of the damage dealt. In addition, you get even angrier when hit, generating 2 extra Rage. This ability does not trigger and is not affected by global recharge time.
Healing done by this ability benefits from increased healing received and suffers from reduced healing received debuffs at a 35% ratio.

vRjz.Name: Forged in Fire
vRjz.Description: Whenever you generate Rage by attacking while below <font color='#FF6600'>75% </font> health, you fight through the pain and heal yourself for <font color='#00FF33'>5% </font> of your maximum health (up to <font color='#00FF33'>750 </font>) every second for <font color='#FF6600'>5 </font> seconds. This can only occur once every <font color='#FF6600'>20 </font> seconds.

iRjz.Name: Shatter
iRjz.Description: Each time you use "Razor Shards" you gather your strength, increasing the power of the next "Razor Shards" by <font color='#FF6600'>6% </font>. This effect can stack up to <font color='#FF6600'>5 </font> times.

jRjz.Name: Outrage
jRjz.Description: Using "Seethe" causes your Rage to spill over, generating <font color='#FF6600'>38 </font> Rage. This Rage is only gained while in combat.

kRjz.Name: Obliterate
kRjz.Description: Your critical hits with "Demolish" are brutally devastating, dealing <font color='#FF6600'>30% </font> more damage.

lRjz.Name: Annihilate
lRjz.Description: Your Rage knows no limits. When Enraged, "Eruption" will no longer generate Rage. Instead it will spend <font color='#FF6600'>50 </font> Rage and increase the damage dealt to <font color='#FF3D3D'>%0.0f </font> physical damage.

mRjz.Name: No Pain, No Gain
mRjz.Description: You embrace pain, growing stronger from it. When "Pain Suppression" ends, you gain "No Pain, No Gain", granting <font color='#FF6600'>18800 </font> Protection for <font color='#FF6600'>3 </font> - <font color='#FF6600'>7 </font> seconds, based on how many attacks you received while "Pain Suppression" was active.  Additionally, while "Pain Suppression" or "No Pain, No Gain" are active, healing received is <font color='#00FF33'>25% </font> more effective.

nRjz.Name: Brawler
nRjz.Description: You are experienced in brawls. The reactive damage dealt by "Enter the Fray" is increased to <font color='#FF3D3D'>%0.0f </font> physical damage and you and allies near the target gain <font color='#FF6600'>10000 </font> Protection for <font color='#FF6600'>6 </font> seconds.

oRjz.Name: Let Loose
oRjz.Description:
Your rage surges when you go on a "Rampage." If using "Rampage" causes you to become Enraged, the base damage of your next Rage spending ability is increased by:

  • Razor Shards: 200%

  • Demolish: 30%

  • Pulverise: 100%

  • Burning Wrath: 160%

  • Eruption with Annihilate Passive: 20%

pRjz.Name: Rock Hard
pRjz.Description: Your fiery rage shields you from harm. Enemies burned by "Blazing Fury" are Debilitated, and you gain 8200 Protection while "Blazing Fury" is active.

qRjz.Name: Juggernaut
qRjz.Description:
Become a hulking Juggernaut. "Unstoppable Force" costs 0 Hammer Energy to activate. While "Unstoppable Force" is active, you take 50% less damage and all healing received is 25% more effective.
"Unstoppable Force" now has a 60 second cooldown.

rRjz.Name: Percussive Maintenance
rRjz.Description: Your Rage fueled blows from "Pulverise" provide you a degree of comfort. When refreshing the duration of the maximum health bonus of "Pulverise" you increase the effectiveness of all healing received by <font color='#FF6600'>5% </font> for <font color='#00FF33'>4 </font> seconds.

sRjz.Name: Animosity
sRjz.Description: Your "Burning Wrath" bolsters your defenses, granting <font color='#FF6600'>140 </font> Protection per target hit by the initial blast of rage for <font color='#FF6600'>10 </font> seconds. This effect can stack up to <font color='#FF6600'>10 </font> times.

tRjz.Name: Beatdown
tRjz.Description: When your "Blindside" ability successfully interrupts a target, you mark the target to get a beatdown for <font color='#FF6600'>6 </font> seconds. Every time the target is hit by you or any of your allies, they have a <font color='#FF6600'>75% </font> chance to generate 1 energy for the weapon they used.

uRjz.Name: Molten Armor
uRjz.Description: The heat of your "Raging Volcano" cools slowly, extending the defensive aspects for an additional <font color='#FF6600'>4 </font> seconds after you stop channeling "Raging Volcano".

wRjz.Name: Bullheaded
wRjz.Description:
The attacks of your enemies infuriate you. Whenever you are attacked and the damage dealt is less than 7% of your maximum health, you generate 2 additional Rage. When the damage dealt is greater than 7% of your maximum health, you gain 10% increased healing received for 4 seconds.

Requires a Hammer.

xRjz.Name: Bristling Rage
xRjz.Description:
Whenever you are hit, your Rage lashes out at the attacker, damaging them. The amount of damage dealt increases based on your current Rage level. At 30 Rage, the damage dealt is %0.0f physical damage.
When you hit an enemy you just damaged this way with a Hammer Power Ability, you have a 30% chance to gain 2045 Protection for 5 seconds.

Requires a Hammer.

yRjz.Name: Die Hard
yRjz.Description:
Your Rage helps you fight through grievous wounds. Whenever you drop below 35% health, you gain 30000 Protection and received healing is 60% more effective. While this effect is active, you lose 8 Rage per second, doubling every 2 seconds. This effect expires when you run out of Rage or you are healed above 50% health. If you have less than 25 Rage when this effect triggers, your current Rage is set to 25 .
This effect has a 60 second cooldown.

Requires a Hammer.

zRjz.Name: Fast and Furious
zRjz.Description: Spurred on by your rage, you gain <font color='#FF6600'>25% </font> movement speed and <font color='#FF6600'>9% </font> increased damage with Hammer attacks for <font color='#FF6600'>3.5 </font> seconds after becoming Enraged.

ARjz.Name: Unbridled Wrath
ARjz.Description:
Your wrath empowers your attacks even further. The power of your Enrage bonus effects is increased:

  • Razor Shards damage over time: 15%

  • Demolish damage: 8%

  • Pulverise new maximum health bonus: 45%

  • Burning Wrath ground area damage: 14%

  • Eruption damage with Annihilate Passive: 5.5%

BRjz.Name: Berserker
BRjz.Description: Your critical hits with Hammer abilities cause a surge of Rage, granting you <font color='#FF6600'>4 </font> extra Rage.

CRjz.Name: Blunt Force Trauma
CRjz.Description: Repeated blows with your Hammer set you up for a devastating finish. After attacking <font color='#FF6600'>4 </font> times with Hammer abilities, you gain <font color='#FF6600'>10% </font> increased critical damage with Hammer abilities for <font color='#FF6600'>3 </font> seconds.

DRjz.Name: Anger Management
DRjz.Description: You learn to control your anger and let it spill forth at the right time. Whenever you use a Hammer Power Ability, your next Hammer Power Ability generates <font color='#FF6600'>2 </font> extra Rage for every second, up to a maximum of <font color='#FF6600'>5 </font>, you waited after using your first Hammer Power Ability.

m=xo.Name: Thrash
m=xo.Description:
Lash out at your target with your claws, striking 2 times for %0.0f physical damage.
Generates 2 Fury per hit.

Requires a Fist Weapon in your Primary Weapon slot.

3u2m.Name: Savage Sweep
3u2m.Description:
PBAoE: Affects up to 6 enemies in a 5 metre radius around you.

Consumes 3 Fist Weapon Energy.
Rip and tear at nearby enemies dealing %0.0f physical damage.
Generates 3 Fury per target hit.

zd2m.Name: Eviscerate
zd2m.Description:
Consumes 2 Fist Weapon Energy.
Impale your target with your claws and tear at their insides dealing %0.0f physical damage and stunning them for 3 seconds. Applies Exposed.

If this ability successfully interrupts a target, you and your group members are healed for %0.0f every second for 5 seconds.

Generates 3 Fury.

y93m.Name: Nurture
y93m.Description:
Your restorative power heals your target for %0.0f , and seeks out and heals the member of your group with the lowest percentage remaining health for the same amount. Each target healed receives an effect that heals %0.0f every second for 3 seconds. The heal over time effect can stack up to 6 times. When your primary target is also the lowest health team member, they receive 2 stacks.

Generates 3 Fury. When your Anima Allocation is at least 51% Healing, you instead generate 5 Fury

Requires a Fist Weapon in your Primary Weapon slot.

tb3m.Name: Mangle
tb3m.Description:
Consumes 5 Fist Weapon Energy.
Mutilate your target with a series of 3 strikes with your claws dealing %0.0f physical damage per hit. Generates 4 Fury per hit.

NZuq.Name: Berserk
NZuq.Description:
Channelled: Every 0.25 seconds for 2.5 seconds.

Consumes 4 Fist Weapon Energy.
Fly into a berserk rage and unleash a flurry of attacks that deal %0.0f physical damage per hit. Applies Exposed.
While channelling, you and your target are rooted to the ground and unable to move.

Generates 2 Fury per hit.

PZuq.Name: Ferocity
PZuq.Description:
Consumes 2 Fist Weapon Energy.
Unleash your ferociousness and empower your next Fist Weapon attack or healing ability. This ability does not trigger and is not affected by global recharge time.

Your next Fist Weapon attack will remove all Fist Weapon damage over time effects from your target and cause them to immediately deal their remaining damage to the target plus an additional %0.0f physical damage. Additionally, 1 beneficial effect will be purged from the target.

Your next Fist Weapon healing ability will remove all Fist Weapon heal over time effects from your defensive target and cause them to immediately heal for their remaining healing plus an additional %0.0f . Additionally, 2 detrimental effects will be cleansed.

Generates 3 Fury.

n=uq.Name: Renewal
n=uq.Description:
Consumes 6 Fist Weapon Energy.
Call forth a resurgence of vigour which heals your defensive target 3 times for %0.0f .

When used to heal yourself, the amount healed is increased by 300% .

Generates 9 Fury.

f4vq.Name: Feral Regrowth
f4vq.Description:
Consumes 10 Fist Weapon Energy.
Call forth the natural recuperative forces in your team, healing them for %0.0f and for an additional %0.0f every second for 6 seconds.

Generates 12 Fury.

F4vq.Name: Primal Instinct
F4vq.Description:
Consumes 4 Fist Weapon Energy.
Give in to your animal instict for a short time, allowing you to both mend and destroy more effictively. For the next 6 seconds, all of your Fist Weapon damage over time effects are 100% more powerful and your heal over time effects are 250% more powerful. This bonus is reduced by 50% when detonating these effects. This ability does not trigger and is not affected by global recharge time.

Generates 18 Fury.

R4vq.Name: Wild Surge
R4vq.Description:
Consumes 2 Fist Weapon Energy.
Create a surge of wild power at the targeted point that lasts 10 seconds. Every second it restores %0.0f health and cleanses 1 detrimental effect from allies in the area and deals %0.0f physical damage to enemies in the area. Enemies hit will also have their movement slowed.

Generates 3 Fury.

25vq.Name: Regeneration
25vq.Description:
Consumes 4 Fist Weapon Energy.
Cause the wounds suffered by you and your group members to seal up and mend, restoring %0.0f health and cleansing 2 detrimental effects. The mending process continues afterward, restoring %0.0f health every second for 4 seconds.

Generates 18 Fury.

Bvmz.Name: Frenzied Wrath
Bvmz.Description:
Tap into your Fury to enter a state of unbridled wrath for a short time and cleanse 2 detrimental effects from yourself. During this time your entire ability bar is changed into a set of new abilities. This ability does not trigger and is not affected by global recharge time. Requires at least 60 Fury to activate.

Ravage: (Default [LMB])
Tear flesh from bone causing horrific wounds dealing %0.0f physical damage and %0.0f physical damage every second for 5 seconds.

Shred: (Default [RMB])
Your razor sharp claws shred nearby enemies dealing %0.0f physical damage and %0.0f physical damage every second for 5 seconds. If the target has the "Maim" effect active, nearby enemies are dealt an additional %0.0f physical damage.

Maim: (Default [E])
Consumes 4 Fist Weapon Energy.
Tear open wounds on your target dealing %0.0f physical damage and %0.0f physical damage every second for 15 seconds.

Dvmz.Name: Invigorating Wrath
Dvmz.Description:
Tap into your Fury to enter a state of reinvigoration for a short time and cleanse 2 detrimental effects from yourself. During this time your entire ability bar is changed into a set of new abilities. This ability does not trigger and is not affected by global recharge time. Requires at least 60 Fury to activate.

Revitalise: (Default [LMB])
Mend the wounds of your target, restoring %0.0f health.

Invigorate: (Default [RMB])
Your fury invigorates your group members, restoring %0.0f health and increasing the amount of healing they receive by 8% for 4 seconds..

Revivify: (Default [E])
Consumes 4 Fist Weapon Energy.
Harness the natural restorative power around you and your group members healing them for %0.0f every second for 6 seconds.

Iqmz.Name: Savagery
Iqmz.Description:
Consumes 2 Fist Weapon Energy.
Draw out the inner savage nature of your defensive target, increasing the strength of their attacks and healing effects by 15% for 6 seconds. This ability does not trigger and is not affected by global recharge time.

Generates 8 Fury.

zumz.Name: Rip
zumz.Description: Your "Savage Sweep" rips jagged wounds into the flesh of your enemies causing them to bleed for <font color='#FF3D3D'>%0.0f </font> physical damage every second for <font color='#FF6600'>5 </font> seconds.

Aumz.Name: Gore
Aumz.Description:
Your control over your Wrath grants you access to a new ability when you are using "Frenzied Wrath."

Gore: (Default [1])
Charge: 15 metre charge to your target. The target must be at least 1 metre away.

You charge to your target and impale them with your claws dealing %0.0f physical damage to up to 6 enemies in a 5 metre radius as you arrive. The target and nearby enemies are left bleeding for %0.0f physical damage every 0.5 seconds for 5 seconds.

Bumz.Name: Maul
Bumz.Description: Your "Mangle" tears open wounds in your target that do not close quickly causing <font color='#FF3D3D'>%0.0f </font> physical damage every second for <font color='#FF6600'>5 </font> seconds.

Cumz.Name: Rampage
Cumz.Description: Your "Berserk" fury crushes and destroys whomever you set your sights on. When you activate "Berserk" the target is additionally stunned for <font color='#FF6600'>5 </font> seconds and the damage dealt is increased to <font color='#FF3D3D'>%0.0f </font> physical damage per hit if the target has one of your Fist Weapon damage over time effects active.

Dumz.Name: Bloodbath
Dumz.Description: When you "Eviscerate" enemies you take advantage of any opening, bolstering your allies and leaving the target maimed. If "Eviscerate" successfully interrupts an enemy it deals an additional <font color='#FF3D3D'>%0.0f </font> physical damage every second for <font color='#FF6600'>5 </font> seconds. Your allies are inspired by the bloodshed, increasing the per second healing amount to <font color='#00FF33'>%0.0f </font>.

Eumz.Name: Brutality
Eumz.Description:
Your brutal "Ferocity" leaves its mark on your allies and enemies alike. If "Ferocity" is used in conjunction with damage over time effects, the target is dealt an additional %0.0f physical damage every second for 5 seconds.

If "Ferocity" is used in conjunction with heal over time effects, the target is healed for an additional %0.0f every second for 5 seconds.

Fumz.Name: Wild Burst
Fumz.Description:
The untamed power of your "Wild Surge" bursts with a final surge of power when it expires. When the ground area effect of "Wild Surge" terminates, allies are healed for up to %0.0f based on the length of time they spent in the area.

Likewise, enemies are dealt up to %0.0f physical damage, based on the length of time they spent in the area.

Gumz.Name: Furious Inspiration
Gumz.Description: The ferocious nature of your "Savagery" provides further inspiration. Whenever the target of your "Savagery" effect deals damage, they are healed for <font color='#00FF33'>%0.0f </font> and you gain <font color='#FF6600'>3 </font> Fury.

Humz.Name: Killer Instinct
Humz.Description: Your "Primal Instinct" is honed with razor sharp purpose. While "Primal Instinct" is active all of your heal over time and damage over time effects have <font color='#FF6600'>50% </font> more Crit Power.

Iumz.Name: Recuperate
Iumz.Description: The restorative power of your "Renewal" allows allies to recover more from your further healing effects. After healing an ally with "Renewal" any additional healing effects on that ally from you will heal for an additional <font color='#00FF33'>%0.0f </font>. This effect lasts for <font color='#FF6600'>3 </font> seconds.

Jumz.Name: Overgrowth
Jumz.Description: Empower the regenerative force of your "Feral Regrowth", increasing the duration of its heal over time by <font color='#FF6600'>2 </font> seconds.

Kumz.Name: Serenity
Kumz.Description:
Your control over your Wrath grants you access to a new ability when you are using "Invigorating Wrath."

Serenity: (Default [1])
A sense of calm washes of you, relieving you of your Fury and channeling it towards restoring your target. You spend all of your remaining Fury to heal an ally for %0.0f plus %0.0f more for every point of Fury spent.

Lumz.Name: Natural Remedy
Lumz.Description: You infuse your "Regeneration" with natural energies, increasing the intial healing amount to <font color='#00FF33'>%0.0f </font>. In addition, any overhealing done to any group member is redirected to the group member with the lowest health.

Oumz.Name: Vigour
Oumz.Description: Your fury fills you with renewed vigour. Whenever you activate a Fist Weapon ability, you have a <font color='#FF6600'>20% </font> chance to restore <font color='#00FF33'>2% </font> of your health every second (up to <font color='#00FF33'>300 </font>) for <font color='#FF6600'>3 </font> seconds.

Pumz.Name: Smell Fear
Pumz.Description: Your keen senses allow you to sense fear in the hearts of enemies around you. Whenever you enter combat and every <font color='#FF6600'>8 </font> seconds afterward you sense fear in a nearby enemy. Hitting this enemy with a Fist Weapon Power Ability generates <font color='#FF6600'>8 </font> Fury.

Qumz.Name: Warmth
Qumz.Description: Your heals have a warm afterglow which aids in the recovery process. Whenever you heal with a single target Fist Weapon Ability, you heal for an additional <font color='#00FF33'>%0.0f </font>. This effect lasts <font color='#FF6600'>2 </font> seconds and can stack up to <font color='#FF6600'>5 </font> times.

Rumz.Name: Furor
Rumz.Description: You work yourself into a frenzy with repeated ability uses. Whenever you use <font color='#FF6600'>3 </font> Fist Weapon Power Abilities in succession you gain an additional <font color='#FF6600'>3 </font> Fury.

Sumz.Name: Second Wind
Sumz.Description: As your wrath subsides, you take a breather and gather your strength. Whenever a "Frenzied Wrath" or "Invigorating Wrath" effect ends, you gain <font color='#FF6600'>4 </font> Fist Weapon Energy.

Tumz.Name: Keen Senses
Tumz.Description:
You are able to sense the weaknesses in both allies and enemies, knowing just how to help and harm effectively. Whenever you heal an ally who is below 35% health with a Fist Weapon ability, you heal for an additional %0.0f .

Whenever you damage an enemy who is below 35% health with a Fist Weapon ability you deal an additional %0.0f physical damage.

Uumz.Name: Wild Nature
Uumz.Description: Your embody the wild and ferocious side of nature, fueling your Fury. While in combat, you gain <font color='#FF6600'>1 </font> Fury every second.

Vumz.Name: Potent Wrath
Vumz.Description:
Your wrath ends with an surge of power. Whenever your "Frenzied Wrath" effect ends, nearby enemies are dealt %0.0f physical damage every second for 5 seconds.

Whenever your "Invigorating Wrath" effect ends all of your group members are healed for %0.0f every second for 5 seconds.

Wumz.Name: Bloody Mist
Wumz.Description: Your critical hits result in a savage spray of blood. Whenever you critically hit with a Fist Weapon ability, you deal an additional <font color='#FF3D3D'>%0.0f </font> physical damage.

Aqoo.Name: Mend
Aqoo.Description:
Spill your blood to restore %0.0f health to your target, and the same amount to the member of your group with the lowest percentage remaining health.

Increases your Martyrdom level by 2 . When your Anima Allocation is at least 51% Healing, you instead increase your Martyrdom level by 4 .

Requires a Blood Magic Focus in your Primary Weapon slot.

eb0p.Name: Sanctuary
eb0p.Description:
Consumes 6 Blood Magic Energy.
Comfort your defensive target, healing them for %0.0f . Overhealing done by this effect generates a shimmering barrier around your defensive target which absorbs 100% of incoming damage and dissipates after absorbing damage equal to the amount of overhealing. The barrier can be increased through multiple casts, up to a maximum strength of %0.0f .

The maximum strength of the barrier increases with your Critical Chance and Critical Power, and benefits from your Martyrdom.

When used to heal yourself, the amount healed is increased by 300% .

Increases your Martyrdom level by 8 .

9yoo.Name: Maleficium
9yoo.Description:
Channelled: Every 0.5 seconds for 2.5 seconds.

Consumes 5 Blood Magic Energy.
Conjure a series of baleful runes which inflict %0.0f magical damage per hit.

Increases your Corruption level by 3 per hit.

Jmkz.Name: Redemption
Jmkz.Description:
Consumes %i Blood Magic Energy.
Recite an incantation to cleanse your soul and aid your defensive target, healing them for %0.0f plus 1 per point of Martyrdom and cleansing them of 10 detrimental effect. This ability does not trigger and is not affected by global recharge time.
Your Martyrdom level must be higher than 50 to use this ability.

Consumes all Martyrdom.

F6vq.Name: Sanguine Coalescence
F6vq.Description:
Consumes 4 Blood Magic Energy.
Your blood coalesces to form a barrier around you that absorbs 100% of incoming damage and is destroyed after absorbing %0.0f damage. The strength of the barrier scales based on your Combat Power.

When the barrier either expires or is destroyed, your blood violenty erupts outwards dealing %0.0f magical damage to all enemies within 5 metres of you.

Increases your Corruption level by 20 when cast. Reduces your Corruption level by 20 when the barrier expires or is destroyed.

B6vq.Name: Dread Sigil
B6vq.Description:
TAoE: Affects 6 enemies in a 5 metre radius around the target.

Consumes 3 Blood Magic Energy.
Etch a blood-forged sigil of dread on the ground underneath your target dealing %0.0f magical damage to the target and nearby enemies.

Increases your Corruption level by 8 .

Ufkz.Name: Torment
Ufkz.Description:
Invoke a ritual of pain on your target dealing %0.0f magical damage.

Increases your Corruption level by 2 .

Requires a Blood Magic Focus in your Primary Weapon slot.

ikyq.Name: Convalesce
ikyq.Description:
Consumes 10 Blood Magic Energy.
Trace runes in the air to invoke a powerful restorative spell which heals your group for %0.0f . Any group member with less than 35% remaining health gains a barrier which absorbs 100% of incoming damage and dissipates after absorbing %0.0f damage.

Increases your Martyrdom level by 12 .

ukyq.Name: Communion
ukyq.Description:
Channelled: Every 0.5 seconds for 2 seconds.

Consumes 4 Blood Magic Energy.
Share your lifeblood with your group members to shield them from harm and restore their health. First, each group member receives a barrier which absorbs 100% of incoming damage and dissipates after absorbing %0.0f damage.

The remaining power of the spell restores %0.0f health per tick. The first and final tick cleanse 1 detrimental effect.

Increases your Martyrdom level by 4 each tick.

Gkyq.Name: Reap
Gkyq.Description:
Consumes 2 Blood Magic Energy.
Replenish yourself by feasting on a flood of power from your target. The target is left bleeding, causing %0.0f magical damage every second for 7 seconds. The stolen power restores 35% of your missing health and cleanses you of 1 detrimental effect.
Your Corruption level must be higher than 10 to use this ability.

Reduces your Corruption level by 50 .

Iyoo.Name: Rupture
Iyoo.Description:
Consumes 2 Blood Magic Energy.
Rip the target's heart from their chest and crush it in your hand dealing %0.0f magical damage. The target also becomes stunned for 3 seconds. The damage dealt is based on your Combat Power if your Corruption level is above 10 or based on your Healing Power if your Martyrdom level is above 10 .

Reduces your Corruption or Martyrdom level by 50 .

J5vq.Name: Eldritch Scourge
J5vq.Description:
Consumes 4 Blood Magic Energy.
Recite a blasphemous invocation which twists and defiles the very being of your target. The destructive energy contained in this magic causes the target to take %0.0f magical damage every second for 6 seconds. Applies Debilitated.

During this time the defilement spreads to nearby enemies causing them to take %0.0f magical damage every second for 3 seconds. Applies Debilitated. In addition, the original target's essence is separated from their body to heal your nearby allies, restoring %0.0f health every second for 3 seconds.

Increases your Corruption or Martyrdom level by 15 . If used when at a neutral position, your Corruption level will be increased.

Q5vq.Name: Desecrate
Q5vq.Description:
Consumes 2 Blood Magic Energy.
Afflict your target with the corruption that flows through your veins purging 1 beneficial effect and dealing %0.0f magical damage every second for 6 seconds. During this time you do not take damage from Corruption. Your Corruption level must be higher than 10 to use this ability.

Jnkz.Name: Runic Hex
Jnkz.Description:
Consumes 2 Blood Magic Energy.
Carve a withering hex onto your target's soul which deals %0.0f magical damage every second for 6 seconds and slows its movement. Applies Debilitated. During this time the target's attacks restore %0.0f health to whomever they attack.

The hex explodes violently when it expires, dealing %0.0f magical damage to nearby enemies and healing nearby allies for %0.0f .

Reduces your Corruption or Martyrdom level by 50 .

Tbbt.Name: Expunge Blight
Tbbt.Description:
Consumes %i Blood Magic Energy.
Draw tainted blood out of your defensive target's heart, creating a Flesh Monstrosity . The Flesh Monstrosity has 50 health and will absorb 20% of all damage dealt to your defensive target, and 8% of all damage dealt to your defensive target's team for 10 seconds, or until it dies. This ability does not trigger and is not affected by global recharge time.
The health of the Flesh Monstrosity scales with your Healing Power.

19lz.Name: Absolution
19lz.Description: You have safeguards built into your magic which trigger when your Corruption or Martyrdom attempts to damage you, healing you for <font color='#00FF33'>2.5% </font> of your maximum health (up to <font color='#00FF33'>375 </font>).

Q8lz.Name: Lingering Curse
Q8lz.Description: The effects of your "Dread Sigil" linger, cursing affected targets by dealing <font color='#FF3D3D'>%0.0f </font> magical damage every second for <font color='#FF6600'>5 </font> seconds.

R8lz.Name: Contaminate
R8lz.Description: When you "Reap" enemies you infuse them with your Corruption, causing the damage over time effect to increase to <font color='#FF3D3D'>%0.0f - %0.0f </font> magical damage per second. The damage dealt increases based on your Corruption level when "Reap" is cast.

S8lz.Name: Flay
S8lz.Description: The magic conjured by your "Maleficium" mercilessly tears at your foes, increasing the damage dealt to <font color='#FF3D3D'>%0.0f </font> on enemies who are affected by any of your Blood Magic damage over time effects.

T8lz.Name: Convergence
T8lz.Description: When "Sanguine Coalescence" expires or is destroyed, the energy converges inside of you instead of exploding outwards causing your next <font color='#FF6600'>4 </font> Blood Magic attacks to deal an additional <font color='#FF3D3D'>%0.0f </font> magical damage.

U8lz.Name: Blood Flow
U8lz.Description:
Power flows from the crushed heart of victims of your "Rupture."

If your Corruption level is above 60 you further afflict the target, dealing %0.0f magical damage every second for 6 seconds.

If your Martyrdom level is above 60 you transform the power into healing energy for your defensive target, restoring %0.0f health every second for 6 seconds.

These effects are improved if "Rupture" successfully interrupts a target.

V8lz.Name: Defilement
V8lz.Description: While your "Desecrate" is active, your Blood Magic abilities inflict further defilement, causing you to gain <font color='#FF6600'>20% </font> more Corruption. If you are already at maximum Corruption, your Blood Magic abilities deal <font color='#FF6600'>16.5% </font> more damage.

W8lz.Name: Antibody
W8lz.Description:
A higher amount of antibodies help to draw forth more tainted blood, increasing the health of the Flesh Monstrosity created by your "Expunge Blight" to %0.0f and increasing the damage it absorbs to 65% for your defensive target, and 30% for secondary targets.

Additionally, as long as the Flesh Monstrosity survives, it will cleanse 1 detrimental effect from all targets every 2 seconds.

X8lz.Name: Paroxysm
X8lz.Description:
The runes inscribed by your "Runic Hex" are carved deep, resulting in mass hexing. When "Runic Hex" expires, any enemies damaged by the resulting detonation are afflicted with a lesser version of the Hex which deals %0.0f magical damage every second for 3 seconds and slows their movement. During this time the target's attacks restore %0.0f health to whomever they attack.

The hex explodes one final time when it expires, dealing %0.0f magical damage to nearby enemies and healing nearby allies for %0.0f .

Y8lz.Name: Desolate
Y8lz.Description: Your "Eldritch Scourge" lays waste to your target's soul increasing the damage and healing done by <font color='#FF6600'>52% </font>.

Z8lz.Name: Haematopoiesis
Z8lz.Description: Your "Sanctuary" ability stimulates the growth of new blood cells in severely injured allies. When you cast "Sanctuary" on an target below <font color='#00FF33'>50% </font> maximum health, "Sanctuary" both heals the target and applies its protective barrier to the target, absorbing damage equal to the amount healed.  You can only affect a specific target this way once every <font color='#FF6600'>15 </font> seconds.

=8lz.Name: Soothe
=8lz.Description: The barrier applied by "Convalesce" is now applied to targets below <font color='#FF6600'>50% </font> health, and amplifies healing energies, increasing incoming healing from all sources by <font color='#FF6600'>20% </font>.

+8lz.Name: Mercy
+8lz.Description:
Your "Redemption" grants relief and aid to those who need it most. "Redemption's" health restoration is increased by 47% . For 3 seconds your Blood healing gains benefit from Martyrdom as though your Martyrdom was at least 61 .

In addition, "Redemption" causes less damage from Martyrdom when used on low health targets.

09lz.Name: Sacrament
09lz.Description: The runic energy which maintains the barriers applied by your "Communion" ability is bound with a powerful charm. Whenever any of your "Communion" barriers are destroyed by incoming damage, your entire group is healed for <font color='#00FF33'>%0.0f </font>.

29lz.Name: Clemency
29lz.Description:
You are able to draw restorative power from your blood when your life is threatened. Whenever you take damage from Corruption or Martyrdom while your health is below 50% you are healed for %0.0f . This effect can only occur a limited number of times.

When you enter combat you gain 5 uses of this restorative effect and you regain 1 every 15 seconds while in combat.

39lz.Name: Sanguine Charm
39lz.Description: You keep a small blood charm at the ready to store your gained power. Whenever you would lose power via reduction in your Corruption or Martyrdom level, the damage and healing done by your Blood Magic abilities is increased by <font color='#FF6600'>9% </font> for <font color='#FF6600'>4 </font> seconds.

49lz.Name: Rites of Refuge
49lz.Description: Your Blood Magic barriers are reinforced by potent magics, increasing the Protection of allies with your barriers by <font color='#FF6600'>1225 </font>.

59lz.Name: Shroud of Retribution
59lz.Description: Your Blood Magic barriers are covered in retributive runes, increasing the strength of your Blood Magic barriers by <font color='#FF6600'>3% </font> and causing <font color='#FF3D3D'>%0.0f </font> magical damage to any attackers. The damage dealt scales with your Combat Power or Healing Power, whichever is higher.

69lz.Name: Last Rites
69lz.Description:
Your magical power allows you to cheat death for a brief time. Whenever you take damage that would have defeated you and your Corruption or Martyrdom level is above 60 , you instead are able to continue living for 4 seconds.

When this time expires, you are truly defeated. If your Corruption level was above 60 when "Last Rites" was triggered, you explode upon death dealing %0.0f magical damage to nearby enemies. If your Martyrdom level was above 60 when "Last Rites" was triggered, you explode upon death restorting %0.0f health to nearby allies.

79lz.Name: Crimson Pulse
79lz.Description: Your blood surges when you critically hit or heal with Blood Magic abilities. When you critically hit, your target suffers <font color='#FF3D3D'>%0.0f </font> magical damage every second for <font color='#FF6600'>3 </font> seconds. When you critically heal, your ally regains <font color='#00FF33'>%0.0f </font> health every second for <font color='#FF6600'>3 </font> seconds.

89lz.Name: Red Tide
89lz.Description: The flow of your blood-fueled restorative magic grows stronger as your Martyrdom level increases. If you gain two power increases from Martyrdom within <font color='#FF6600'>6 </font> seconds, the power of your Blood Magic heals is increased by <font color='#FF6600'>10% </font> for <font color='#FF6600'>6 </font> seconds.

99lz.Name: Curse of Destruction
99lz.Description: The power of your Corrupted blood curses your foes to ruination. If your Corruption level is above <font color='#FF6600'>10 </font>, your Blood Magic critical hits curse your target for <font color='#FF6600'>5 </font> seconds causing them to take an additional <font color='#FF3D3D'>%0.0f </font> magical damage from subsequent Blood Magic critical hits.

WPno.Name: Schism
WPno.Description:
PBAoE: Affects up to 6 enemies in a 5 metre radius around you.

Consumes 3 Chaos Energy.
Split matter from energy in an area around you, dealing %0.0f magical damage.

lWno.Name: Pandemonium
lWno.Description:
PBAoE: Affects up to 6 enemies in up to a 7 metre area around you.

Consumes 4 Chaos Energy.
Unfurl the full extent of the chaotic power that resides in all things. Nearby enemies are caught up in the swell of power and are dealt %0.0f magical damage as they are flung to the ground.

n04r.Name: Breakdown
n04r.Description:
Consumes 5 Chaos Energy.
Focus your chaotic energy into a series of 4 hits. Each hit breaks down the target's corporeal form dealing %0.0f magical damage.

d04r.Name: Tumultuous Whisper
d04r.Description:
Column: Affects up to 6 enemies in a 2 metre wide by 10 metre long area in front of you.

Consumes 2 Chaos Energy.
Let loose a wave of entropic power, withering and decaying enemies in front of you dealing %0.0f magical damage. Affected enemies are purged of 1 beneficial effect.

The damage dealt by this attack will always be divisible by eight, resulting in 2 - 4 Paradoxes.

This ability cannot critically hit. Instead, its damage is increased by a combination of your critical chance and critical power.

h04r.Name: Entropy
h04r.Description:
Consumes 2 Chaos Energy.
Your Chaos attacks are fueled with the energy that brings all things to their end, increasing all Chaos damage dealt by 10% and Critical Power by 8.5% . This effect lasts 8 seconds.

Additionally, your next Chaos attack purges 1 beneficial effect from each target hit.



This ability does not trigger and is not affected by global recharge time.

b04r.Name: Turmoil
b04r.Description:
PBAoE: Affects up to 6 enemies in a 5 metre radius around you.

Execute a spinning kick charged with a torrent of chaotic power dealing %0.0f magical damage.

Requires a Chaos Focus in your Primary Weapon slot.

=+3r.Name: Immutable
=+3r.Description:
Consumes 4 Chaos Energy.
The swirling torrent of chaotic energy within you shifts even more damage across dimensional boundaries, increasing the amount of damage delayed by Aegis of Parallelism by an additional 30% and reducing the delayed damage by 80% for 7 seconds. Additionally, during this time you generate 20% more threat. This ability does not trigger and is not affected by global recharge time.

204r.Name: Distortion
204r.Description:
Consumes 3 Chaos Energy.
Cause a ripple in the fabric of reality within your target dealing %0.0f magical damage.

404r.Name: Deconstruct
404r.Description:
Charge your hands with chaotic energy and strike your target 3 times, dealing %0.0f magical damage per hit.

Requires a Chaos Focus in your Primary Weapon slot.

RI0r.Name: Twist Fate
RI0r.Description:
Signature Ability
PBAoE: Affects up to 6 enemies in a 10 metre radius around you.

Consumes 3 Chaos Energy.
Twist reality, dealing %0.0f damage to nearby enemies, %0.0f damage every second for 12 seconds, and clearing 65% of the damage currently delayed by Aegis of Parallelism.

Evading attacks and reaching 8 Paradoxes reduce the remaining cooldown time.
This signature ability scales with tanking stats, and shares a cooldown with other signature abilities.

PI0r.Name: Reality Fracture
PI0r.Description:
PBAoE: Affects up to 6 enemies in a 5 metre radius around you.

Consumes 2 Chaos Energy.
Leap into the air and shatter the barrier between realities and cause chaotic energy to burst forth in an area around you dealing %0.0f magical damage. Applies Exposed.

If this attack hits 3 or more enemies, it generates 1 Paradox.

NI0r.Name: Evulsion
NI0r.Description:
Consumes 2 Chaos Energy.
Forcibly tear out a portion of the chaotic energy in your target dealing %0.0f magical damage. The force of the extraction causes the target to be pulled toward you and purges 1 beneficial effect. Additionally, the target is forced to attack you for 5 seconds. This ability has a 15 metre range.

VI0r.Name: Anomaly
VI0r.Description:
Channelled: Every second for 3 seconds.
PBAoE: Affects up to 6 enemies in a 10 metre radius around you.

Consumes 4 Chaos Energy.
Create a localised anomaly within the palm of your hands. Each twist of your hands sends out waves of destructive energy dealing %0.0f magical damage and sending targets flying into the air. Applies Exposed. Your Evade Chance is increased by 10% while channeling this ability.

Damage dealt by this ability has a 20% chance to generate 1 Paradox.

TI0r.Name: Winds of Change
TI0r.Description:
PBAoE: Affects up to 6 enemies in a 5 metre radius around you.

Consumes 5 Chaos Energy.
Send the destructive winds of change to wreak havoc on nearby enemies dealing %0.0f magical damage.

dVmz.Name: Invoke Self
dVmz.Description:
Consumes 2 Chaos Energy.
Your mastery of dimensional chaos magic allows you to call yourself for aid from parallel dimensions. Summons 2 Extradimensional Defenders with 20% of your maximum health who intercept 80% of incoming damage. The Defenders will return to their own dimension when they suffer fatal damage or after 7 seconds. This ability does not trigger and is not affected by global recharge time.

EZmz.Name: Paradox Control
EZmz.Description: The paradoxes generated by your "Schism" are all within your control, causing an additional Paradox to be gained when "Schism" deals damage divisible by 8.

5=mz.Name: Dissolution
5=mz.Description: Generating a Paradox by dealing damage divisible by 8 while "Entropy" is active increases the strength of the decomposing energies. For the remainder of "Entropy's" duration, the damage bonus is increased to <font color='#FF6600'>24% </font>.

+=mz.Name: Disintegrate
+=mz.Description: If all hits of "Breakdown" are successful, the target's form collapses further dealing <font color='#FF3D3D'>%0.0f </font> magical damage every second for <font color='#FF6600'>5 </font> seconds. If this effect is already active, the target instead takes <font color='#FF3D3D'>%0.0f </font> magical damage instantly.

I0nz.Name: Fractured Existence
I0nz.Description: The chaotic power unleashed by "Pandemonium" lashes out with great force creating Singularities that deal <font color='#FF3D3D'>%0.0f </font> magical damage to enemies caught in the blast.

U0nz.Name: Displacement
U0nz.Description: Your "Invoke Self" summons <font color='#FF6600'>1 </font> additional Extradimensional Defender and all Extradimensional Defenders last <font color='#FF6600'>3 </font> seconds longer.  Additionally, activating "Invoke Self" cleanses up to <font color='#FF6600'>3 </font> debuffs, displacing them to other dimensions.

62nz.Name: Rend Space
62nz.Description: Your "Reality Fracture" rends spacetime itself for <font color='#FF6600'>5 </font> seconds. Enemies standing in the wake of your "Reality Fracture" are dealt <font color='#FF3D3D'>%0.0f </font> magical damage every second.

d2nz.Name: Out of Phase
d2nz.Description: When you "Twist Fate", you pull so harshly on reality that affected enemies are Debilitated and you wind up out of phase, increasing the amount of damage delayed by Aegis of Parallelism by 25% and increasing your chance to evade attacks by 10% for 6 seconds.

y2nz.Name: X Factor
y2nz.Description:
You are the "X" Factor that connects anomalous events; evasive and confusing yet undeniably there. Your "Anomaly" increases your Evade Chance by 40% while channeling and for 5 seconds after, enemies are Debilitated and when they stand up they are dealt %0.0f magical damage.
When the Evade Chance buff expires by timing out, all enemies who were damaged by "Anomaly" become confused and will miss their next attack made within 5 seconds.
"Anomaly" now has a 60 second cooldown.

J2nz.Name: Veil of Deformity
J2nz.Description: Your "Distortion" deforms the space around your form, increasing your maximum health by <font color='#00FF33'>30% </font> for <font color='#FF6600'>15 </font> seconds.

Y3nz.Name: Ripples in Reality
Y3nz.Description: The "Winds of Change" subtly alter probability. After being damaged by "Winds of Change", enemies have their chance to miss increased by <font color='#FF6600'>3% </font> for <font color='#FF6600'>5 </font> seconds.

p4nz.Name: Mass Evulsion
p4nz.Description: Your "Evulsion" cascades from one enemy to the next. The target and any enemies near the target are pulled towards you, purged, and dealt <font color='#FF3D3D'>%0.0f </font> magical damage.

r4nz.Name: Incongruity
r4nz.Description: When "Immutable" ends, several transdimensional threads are severed, clearing 35% damage currently delayed by Aegis of Parallelism, and rendering you immune to delayed damage for 2 seconds.

E5nz.Name: Paradoxical Restoration
E5nz.Description: You direct the paradoxical energies generated by your chaotic magic towards unmaking your injuries. Whenever you generate a Paradox, you restore <font color='#00FF33'>4% </font> of your maximum health (up to <font color='#00FF33'>600 </font>).  This can only occur once every <font color='#FF6600'>3 </font> seconds.

J5nz.Name: Probability Protection
J5nz.Description: Your Chaos Abilities bend probability and chance in your favor. Whenever you hit with a Chaos ability, if you have been hit by an enemy since the last time you attacked, you will gain <font color='#FF6600'>2.5% </font> evade chance until you successfully evade an attack. This effect stacks, but does not persist outside of combat.

c6nz.Name: Blessing of Octed
c6nz.Description: You are blessed by the powers of chance, increasing the likelihood of your Chaos Abilities dealing damage divisible by 8 by <font color='#FF6600'>6% </font>, thereby generating Paradoxes.

A6nz.Name: Multidimensional Threads
A6nz.Description: Your chaotic abilities tap into parellel dimensions and intermingle them with your own, further empowering your Aegis of Parallelism. An additional 15% of incoming damage is delayed, and delayed damage is reduced by 11% .

V6nz.Name: Butterfly Effect
V6nz.Description: Your chaotic magics generate destructive disturbances in nearby enemies. Whenever you deal damage with Chaos Abilities, you have a <font color='#FF6600'>10% </font> chance to deal <font color='#FF3D3D'>%0.0f </font> magical damage to another nearby enemy and generate <font color='#FF6600'>1 </font> Paradox.

L8nz.Name: Long Term Chaos
L8nz.Description: Through probability manipulation you are able to extend the duration over which damage is delayed by Aegis of Parallelism by 3 seconds. In addition, delayed damage is reduced by 6% and the health of your Extradimensional Defenders is increased by 50% .

m9nz.Name: Eye of the Ruinstorm
m9nz.Description: You focus the potential energy of your Singularities causing them to detonate more slowly, but also improving the damage they deal to <font color='#FF3D3D'>%0.0f </font> magical damage.

T9nz.Name: Resonance Cascade
T9nz.Description: You have an <font color='#FF6600'>18.5% </font> chance to generate <font color='#FF6600'>1 </font> Paradox every second while in combat.

K0nz.Name: Duality
K0nz.Description: If your "Tumultuous Whisper" causes you to exceed <font color='#FF6600'>8 </font> Paradoxes, the entropic energy splits a portion of your essence into an Extradimensional Doppelganger who will attack your foes.

RFnz.Name: Body Double
RFnz.Description: You become more in tune with your Extradimensional Doppelgangers, increasing the damage they deal by <font color='#FF6600'>50% </font>.

WR3o.Name: Shock
WR3o.Description:
Chain: Jumps up to 8 metres 5 times, hitting up to 6 enemies.

Send a shock of electricity through your target which chains to other nearby targets. Affected targets are dealt %0.0f magical damage.

Increases your heat level by 6 .

Requires an Elementalism Focus in your Primary Weapon slot.

JS3o.Name: Fire Bolt
JS3o.Description:
Consumes 3 Elemental Energy.
Fling a flaming bolt at your target dealing %0.0f magical damage.

Increases your heat level by 14 .

FW3o.Name: Chain Lightning
FW3o.Description:
Chain: Jumps up to 8 metres 5 times, hitting up to 6 enemies.

Consumes 3 Elemental Energy.
Send a crackling bolt of lightning through your target which then leaps to nearby enemies. Affected targets are dealt %0.0f magical damage.

Increases your heat level by 14 .

UW3o.Name: Mjolnir
UW3o.Description:
Consumes 5 Elemental Energy.
Harness the power of the mythical hammer to send devastating bolts of lightning at your target dealing %0.0f magical damage.

Increases your heat level by 21 .

6Gbq.Name: Flash Freeze
6Gbq.Description:
PBAoE, TAoE: Affects up to 3 enemies in a 5 metre range.

Consumes 2 Elemental Energy.
Instantly freeze the area around you dealing %0.0f magical damage. If you have a hostile target, also freeze the area around your target. Applies Debilitated and slows all damaged targets for 7 seconds.

Reduces your heat level by 40 . Can be used while Overheated to remove the Overheated effect.

When you Overheat, this ability's cooldown is reset.

5Gbq.Name: Flicker
5Gbq.Description:
Consumes 2 Elemental Energy.
You vanish with a flicker of electricity and teleport 10 metres forward. When you arrive at your destination, the area becomes electrified. Enemies standing in the area are dealt %0.0f magical damage every second. This ability can be activated a second time within 5 seconds of the first use.

The first activation of this ability reduces your heat level by 40 . Can be used while Overheated to remove the Overheated effect but you cannot activate this ability a second time. If the follow-up activation is used, it increases your heat level by 25 heat.

When you Overheat, this ability's cooldown is reset.

TFbq.Name: Blizzard
TFbq.Description:
Consumes 4 Elemental Energy.
Create an intense blizzard at the targeted point that lasts 8 seconds. Every 0.5 seconds it will deal %0.0f magical damage to up to 6 enemies in a 5 metre radius. Applies Debilitated. Targets that are hit 5 times are rooted to the ground for 4 seconds.

Reduces your heat level by 40 . Can be used while Overheated to remove the Overheated effect.

SFbq.Name: Fireball
SFbq.Description:
Launch a ball of flame at your target dealing %0.0f magical damage.

Increases your heat level by 6 .

Requires an Elementalism Focus in your Primary Weapon slot.

RFbq.Name: Living Flame
RFbq.Description:
Consumes 2 Elemental Energy.
Summon a metaphysical manifestation of the concept of fire itself, creating a Living Flame at the targeted location. The Living Flame has %i health and will attack your enemies for %i damage every 1.5 seconds. When summoned, the Living Flame immediately casts Flame Flare.
Casting this ability while you have a Living Flame active teleports the Living Flame to the targeted location and causes it to immediately cast Flame Flare.

Flame Flare: Deals %i damage in a 5 metre radius around the Living Flame and affected targets are stunned for 3 seconds.

Increases your heat level by 25 .

PFbq.Name: Ice Beam
PFbq.Description:
Consumes 4 Elemental Energy.
Focus your energy to unleash a gelid beam of frost at your target dealing %0.0f magical damage and slowing its movement. Applies Debilitated.

Reduces your heat level by 40 . Can be used while Overheated to remove the Overheated effect.

AFbq.Name: Flashpoint
AFbq.Description:
Consumes 2 Elemental Energy.
You harness the destructive forces of Elementalism for 4 seconds. During this time, all of your Elementalism abilities deal damage as if you were at the maximum heat level. Your heat level neither increases nor decreases for the duration of this beneficial effect. This ability does not trigger and is not affected by global recharge time.

zFbq.Name: Crystallised Frost
zFbq.Description:
Consumes 2 Elemental Energy.
Summon a crystallised manifestation of ice at your location that lasts 9 seconds. Every 3 seconds it will hit up to 6 enemies in a 5 metre radius, dealing %0.0f magical damage. Applies Debilitated.

Reduces your heat level by 10 when summoned and if you are standing within the cold area when a damage pulse occurs. Can be used while Overheated.

xFbq.Name: Crystallised Storm
xFbq.Description:
Consumes 2 Elemental Energy.
Summon a crystallised manifestation of lightning at the targeted point that lasts 10 seconds. Every second, it deals %0.0f magical damage to nearby enemies as lightning jumps between them.

When cast, and after 5 seconds, if your heat level is above 30 , up to 6 enemies in the area have 1 beneficial effect purged from them.

Increases your heat level by 25 .

wFbq.Name: Inferno
wFbq.Description:
TAoE: Affects up to 6 enemies in a 5 metre radius around the target.

Consumes 5 Elemental Energy.
Create a blazing inferno at the target's location that deals %0.0f magical damage.

Increases your heat level by 21 .

tFbq.Name: Overload
tFbq.Description:
Channelled: Every second for 3 seconds.
GTAoE: Affects up to 6 enemies in a 10 metre radius around the targeted point.

Consumes 4 Elemental Energy.
Blast the targeted area with a barrage of elemental energy dealing %0.0f magical damage per hit. The cold portion of this ability applies Debilitated. The electrical portion of this ability purges 2 beneficial effects.

The cold portion of this ability reduces your heat level by 40 . The fire and electrical portion of this ability each increase your heat level by 10 . Can be used while Overheated to remove the Overheated effect.

M5lz.Name: Cauterise
M5lz.Description: Expend your heat to staunch your wounds. Every <font color='#FF6600'>3 </font> heat generating abilities you use restores <font color='#00FF33'>4% </font> of your maximum health (up to <font color='#00FF33'>600 </font>) and reduces your heat level by <font color='#FF6600'>4 </font>.

x2lz.Name: Static Charge
x2lz.Description: Your "Chain Lightning" charges targets with static energy for <font color='#FF6600'>3 </font> seconds. The next time you damage a static-charged target with "Chain Lightning" the static energy is discharged dealing <font color='#FF3D3D'>%0.0f </font> magical damage to the target and enemies near the target.

93lz.Name: Cryoblast
93lz.Description: Enemies damaged by your "Flash Freeze" experience an even deeper chill, freezing them in place for <font color='#FF6600'>4 </font> seconds. In addition if "Flash Freeze" is used when your heat level is above <font color='#FF6600'>30 </font>, you harness the heat energy lost, turning it into a beneficial effect which increases your Elemental damage by <font color='#FF6600'>20% </font> for <font color='#FF6600'>5 </font> seconds.

E3lz.Name: Superconductor
E3lz.Description: Increase the conductivity of your "Mjolnir" causing it to strike unerringly and with devastating effect. "Mjolnir" can no longer glance and its critical hits deal <font color='#FF6600'>32% </font> more damage.

I3lz.Name: Glaciate
I3lz.Description: "Ice Beam" freezes the target, causing them to become brittle for <font color='#FF6600'>5 </font> seconds. Attacks against the brittle target deal an additional <font color='#FF3D3D'>%0.0f </font> magical damage.

O3lz.Name: Icy Steps
O3lz.Description: You attune yourself to your "Crystallised Frost" causing it to follow you wherever you go. In addition, the amount of heat reduction is increased to <font color='#FF6600'>15 </font> per pulse and each pulse also immobilises targets for <font color='#FF6600'>2 </font> seconds.

04lz.Name: Synergetic Flames
04lz.Description:
Empower your "Living Flame", increasing its attack damage to %i and the damage of Flame Flare to %i . While you have a Living Flame active, the cast time of "Living Flame" is reduced by 1 second.

Living Flame will provoke enemies who attack you, and when you deal fire or lightning Elemental damage your Living Flame is healed for 35% of the damage done. The provoke effect does not work against Dungeon, Lair, or Raid monsters.

h4lz.Name: Discharge
h4lz.Description: When "Crystallised Storm" purges a beneficial effect from a target or damages an enemy with a beneficial effect that can be purged, the magical energy is discharged violently dealing <font color='#FF3D3D'>%0.0f </font> magical damage to the target and nearby enemies. This effect has a <font color='#FF6600'>33% </font> chance to trigger on targets who do not have any beneficial effects.

65lz.Name: Volatile Current
65lz.Description: You reappear with a blast of electrical energy when using "Flicker." Immediately after arriving at your destination, you stun any nearby enemies for <font color='#FF6600'>3 </font> seconds and deal <font color='#FF3D3D'>%0.0f </font> magical damage.

m5lz.Name: Frigid Tempest
m5lz.Description: The frozen winds of your "Blizzard" chill enemies to their core, increasing the damage dealt by <font color='#FF6600'>21% </font>. In addition, enemies damaged by "Blizzard" are instantly immobilised and standing in your "Blizzard" reduces your heat level by <font color='#FF6600'>2 </font> every <font color='#FF6600'>0.5 </font> seconds.

q5lz.Name: Blazing Bolts
q5lz.Description: Your "Fire Bolt" grows hotter and more powerful with each successive use. Each time you use "Fire Bolt" your next "Fire Bolt" generates <font color='#FF6600'>1 </font> additional heat and deals <font color='#FF6600'>5% </font> more damage. This effect can stack up to <font color='#FF6600'>4 </font> times. Using any ability other than "Fire Bolt" removes this effect.

w5lz.Name: Scorched Earth
w5lz.Description: The heat of your "Inferno" burns hot enough to ignite the ground. If your heat level is above <font color='#FF6600'>30 </font>, "Inferno" leaves a damaging area which deals <font color='#FF3D3D'>%0.0f </font> magical damage every second for <font color='#FF6600'>10 </font> seconds.

x5lz.Name: Blast Wave
x5lz.Description: When "Flashpoint" expires, you expel the increased heat from your body dealing <font color='#FF3D3D'>%0.0f - %0.0f </font> magical damage to nearby enemies. The damage dealt increases based on your heat level when"Flashpoint" expires.

E5lz.Name: Elemental Force
E5lz.Description: Harness the force of the elements when you use "Overload." The cold portion of this attack's Heat reduction is increased to <font color='#FF6600'>50 </font>, the electrical portion causes enemies in the area take an additional <font color='#FF3D3D'>%0.0f </font> magical damage, and the fire portion knocks down enemies for <font color='#FF6600'>3 </font> seconds and sets them ablaze dealing <font color='#FF3D3D'>%0.0f </font> magical damage every second for <font color='#FF6600'>6 </font> seconds.

T5lz.Name: Maxwell's Demon
T5lz.Description: You excel at managing and equalizing your heat. Whenever you critically hit with an Elemental ability, you store your current heat level. <font color='#FF6600'>4 </font> seconds later, you reduce your heat level to the stored level if the stored level is lower than your current heat level. This effect can only occur once every <font color='#FF6600'>5 </font> seconds and if your heat level is above <font color='#FF6600'>50 </font>.

+5lz.Name: Elemental Control
+5lz.Description:
You have mastered the inner workings of fire and electricity.

Whenever you deal damage with an Elemental fire ability, you set the target on fire dealing %0.0f magical damage every second for 5 seconds.

Whenever you deal damage with an Elemental electrical ability you create an electrical current within the target for 3 seconds. If you damage the target again while this effect is active, the target and nearby enemies are dealt %0.0f magical damage.

k6lz.Name: Calorimetry
k6lz.Description: Your internal temperature runs hotter than the average person. Your base out of combat heat level is increased to <font color='#FF6600'>15 </font>. Also, your first Elementalism attack when entering combat deals an additional <font color='#FF3D3D'>%0.0f </font> magical damage. While in combat, this bonus damage effect can occur once every <font color='#FF6600'>10 </font> seconds.

y6lz.Name: Thermocoupler
y6lz.Description:
Your understanding of heat allows you to flow easily from one element to the next.

When using Elemental fire abilities, your next Elemental electrical ability will reduce your heat level by 3 .

When using Elemental electrical abilities, your next Elemental fire ability will reduce your heat level by 3 .

Once either of these heat reducing effects have triggered 4 times, the attack which triggered it deals an additional %0.0f magical damage.

B7lz.Name: Combustion
B7lz.Description: Whenever you critically hit with Elemental fire or electrical abilities, heat blazes inside of you dealing an additional <font color='#FF3D3D'>%0.0f </font> magical damage to the target. Also, your heat level increases by an additional <font color='#FF6600'>5 </font>. This bonus heat is not generated if your heat level is above <font color='#FF6600'>50 </font>.

I7lz.Name: Thermodynamo
I7lz.Description: The heat within you burns bright and strong. When at the maximum heat level, the bonus damage from heat is increased by <font color='#FF6600'>4.5% </font>.

J7lz.Name: Supercooler
J7lz.Description: As fights go on, you improve your efficiency at managing your heat. You gain <font color='#FF6600'>1 </font> "Supercooler" counter when entering combat and every <font color='#FF6600'>5 </font> seconds afterward. Every <font color='#FF6600'>5 </font> seconds, you reduce your current heat level by <font color='#FF6600'>2 </font> per stack of "Supercooler." This effect can stack a maximum of <font color='#FF6600'>5 </font> times. When this heat reduction occurs, the remaining recharge time for all Elementalism cold abilities is reduced by <font color='#FF6600'>7% </font>.

L7lz.Name: Lingering Frost
L7lz.Description: Your cold abilities provide a lingering presence of frost, cooling you down afterward and leaving your foes frostbitten. Enemies damaged by your cold abilities are dealt <font color='#FF3D3D'>%0.0f </font> magical damage every second for <font color='#FF6600'>5 </font> seconds. Also, after using any cold ability, you will lose an additional <font color='#FF6600'>2 </font> heat every second for <font color='#FF6600'>5 </font> seconds and nearby enemies have their hate towards you reduced.

mEjo.Name: Scattershot
mEjo.Description:
Cone: Affects up to 6 enemies in a 60 degree 7 metre cone in front of you.

Fire a blast of shot from your shotgun at enemies in front of you dealing %0.0f physical damage.

Consumes 1 shell.
When reloading your Shotgun, the slot this ability is placed into will always be the previous loaded shell type.

Requires a Shotgun in your Primary Weapon slot.

NEjo.Name: Kneecapper
NEjo.Description:
Cone: Affects up to 6 enemies in a 60 degree 9 metre cone in front of you.

Consumes 4 Shotgun Energy.
Fire a concentrated shot of power from your shotgun towards the ground creating a blast wave in front of you, knocking enemies down, dealing %0.0f physical damage, and slowing their movement.

For 8 seconds afterward, all attacks against you are 27.0% - 38.4% more likely to glance. This bonus increases based on the number of shotgun shells consumed.

Consumes all shells.

WEjo.Name: Pump Action
WEjo.Description:
Blast an enemy with a shot from your shotgun dealing %0.0f physical damage.

Consumes 1 shell.
When reloading your Shotgun, the slot this ability is placed into will always be the previous loaded shell type.

Requires a Shotgun in your Primary Weapon slot.

CFjo.Name: Both Barrels
CFjo.Description:
Cone: Affects up to 6 enemies in a 60 degree 7 metre cone in front of you.

Consumes 3 Shotgun Energy.
