Unleash a deadly diffused blast from your shotgun dealing %0.0f physical damage to enemies in front of you.

Consumes 1 shell.

HK0r.Name: HEAT Round
HK0r.Description:
TAoE: Affects up to 6 enemies in a 5 metre radius around the target.

Consumes 5 Shotgun Energy.
Launch a high-explosive anti-tank round at your target dealing %0.0f physical damage to any enemies caught in the blast.

Consumes 1 shell.

GK0r.Name: Rocket Pod
GK0r.Description:
Consumes 3 Shotgun Energy.
Launch a miniaturised rocket at your target dealing %0.0f physical damage.

Consumes 1 shell.

FK0r.Name: Full Salvo
FK0r.Description:
Channelled: Every 0.5 seconds for 2.5 seconds.
Cone: Affects up to 6 enemies in a 9 metre long 60 degree cone in front of you.

Consumes 4 Shotgun Energy.
Lay waste to all who stand before you with repeated blasts from your shotgun dealing %0.0f physical damage per hit.

Consumes 5 shells.

AK0r.Name: Raging Shot
AK0r.Description:
Consumes 5 Shotgun Energy.
Concentrate your power into a full-force shotgun blast dealing %0.0f physical damage.

Consumes 1 shell.

yK0r.Name: CQC
yK0r.Description:
Consumes 2 Shotgun Energy.
Bash an enemy with the stock of your shotgun, knocking them down. Follow up with a close-range shotgun blast dealing %0.0f physical damage.

This ability has a 3 metre range.

Consumes 1 shell.

vK0r.Name: Cleanup
vK0r.Description:
Consumes 2 Shotgun Energy.
Isolate the purifying elements left-over from your fired shotgun shells and disperse that energy to all of your group members. 2 detrimental effects, plus 1 for every 2 unloaded shells, will be cleansed from each group member over 10 seconds, checking for detrimental effects every 0.5 seconds.

Your next Shotgun attack will purge 1 beneficial effect from each target hit.

This ability does not trigger and is not affected by global recharge time. Additionally, this ability is available while reloading.

oK0r.Name: Bombardment
oK0r.Description:
Consumes 4 Shotgun Energy.
Fire all of your shells into the air and cause them to rain down at the targeted point. A shell will strike a random enemy within 7 metres every 1.25 seconds for 10 seconds.

Affected enemies are dealt %0.0f physical damage and are Exposed. Other enemies within 3 metres of the target are dealt %0.0f physical damage.

Consumes 6 shells.

qFjo.Name: Opening Shot
qFjo.Description:
Consumes 2 Shotgun Energy.
Fire a shot into the air to signal it is time to open fire. For the next 8 seconds, you and your group members' Critical Power is increased by 30% . A target can only gain this bonus once every 20 seconds. This ability does not trigger and is not affected by global recharge time.

Consumes 1 shell.

4Djz.Name: Shell Salvage
4Djz.Description:
Salvage some of your power from your shotgun shells to gain 3 - 8 Shotgun Energy. The amount gained is based on how many shells were salvaged. This ability does not trigger and is not affected by global recharge time.

Consumes all shells.

G6jz.Name: Reinforce Shells
G6jz.Description:
Consumes 2 Shotgun Energy.
Reinforce your infused ammunition with a surge of anima, increasing your Protection by 20400 for 6 seconds and cleansing 1 detrimental effect from you.

This ability does not trigger and is not affected by global recharge time. Additionally, this ability is available while reloading.

7Djz.Name: Sonic Blast
7Djz.Description:
Signature Ability
PBAoE: Affects up to 6 enemies in a 10 metre radius around you.

Consumes 3 Shotgun Energy.
Unleash a defeaning blast, dealing %0.0f damage and %0.0f damage every second for 12 seconds to nearby enemies, and goading them into attacking you for 6 seconds. Additionally, your Protection is increased by 8200 for 6 seconds.

Successfully glancing incoming attacks, and reloading your shotgun reduce the remaining cooldown time.
This signature ability scales with tanking stats, and shares a cooldown with other signature abilities.

JGjz.Name: Restorative Reload
JGjz.Description: Whenever you reload your shotgun you salvage a portion of your power, healing you for <font color='#00FF33'>6% </font> of your maximum health (up to <font color='#00FF33'>900 </font>).

LDjz.Name: Blast Barrels
LDjz.Description: Concentrate additional power into your "Both Barrels" ability, causing this ability to perform an additional hit dealing <font color='#FF3D3D'>%0.0f </font> physical damage to each target.

QDjz.Name: Salvage Expert
QDjz.Description: When using "Shell Salvage," your expertise at salvaging allows you to cause this ability to always offer the option to reload the same type of shell you just salvaged. In addition, you also gain <font color='#FF6600'>5 </font> Energy for your other weapon.

cEjz.Name: Point Blank Shot
cEjz.Description: Get up close and personal with "Raging Shot," increasing the damage dealt to <font color='#FF3D3D'>%0.0f </font> physical damage to targets within <font color='#FF6600'>3 </font> metres.

kEjz.Name: Withering Salvo
kEjz.Description: Pour your full force into your "Full Salvo" ability, causing each successive hit to deal <font color='#FF6600'>40% </font> more base damage.

lEjz.Name: Resupply
lEjz.Description: Channel the defensive anima that empowers your shells, increasing your chance to be glanced by <font color='#FF6600'>30% </font> while "Reinforce Shells" is active.

zEjz.Name: All Eyes On Me
zEjz.Description: "Sonic Blast" silences the din and focuses everyone's attention on you, increasing your maximum health by <font color='#00FF33'>30% </font> for <font color='#FF6600'>60 </font> seconds and causing attacks that glance you to increase your Protection by <font color='#FF6600'>9000 </font> for <font color='#FF6600'>4 </font> seconds.

BEjz.Name: Fire at Will
BEjz.Description: Keep firing! When you activate "Opening Shot" you gain a beneficial effect that causes your Shotgun attacks to deal <font color='#FF3D3D'>%0.0f </font> additional physical damage until an enemy deals damage to you. Also, when you critically hit with a Shotgun ability while "Opening Shot" is active you reload <font color='#FF6600'>1 </font> shell.

5Fjz.Name: Cleanup Crew
5Fjz.Description: Whenever "Cleanup" cleanses a detrimental effect from you or a group member, or purges a beneficial effect from an enemy, you and your group become empowered: For the next <font color='#FF6600'>6 </font> seconds, all attacks deal an additional <font color='#FF3D3D'>%0.0f </font> physical damage.

xFjz.Name: Supremacy
xFjz.Description:
Your skill with explosives enables you to utilize "Bombardment" to intercept and partially deflect incoming attacks with shrapnel. While you stand in your "Bombardment", you gain 40000 Protection and are immune to crowd control effects. While your allies stand in your "Bombardment", they gain 7100 Protection and are immune to snare and root effects.
Damage done by "Bombardment" is increased to %i to the primary target, and %i to proximal targets.
"Bombardment" now has a 60 second cooldown and no longer requires or consumes shells.

WFjz.Name: Reinforced Rockets
WFjz.Description: Whenever you fire a "Rocket Pod" you also bolster your defences, increasing your chance to be Glanced by <font color='#FF6600'>1.3% </font> for <font color='#FF6600'>10 </font> seconds. This effect can stack up to <font color='#FF6600'>3 </font> times.

pGjz.Name: Controlled Blast
pGjz.Description:
When launching your "HEAT Round" at enemies, you draw strength from those affected by the blast. You gain 140 Protection for each enemy caught in the blast.

Additionally, any allies within the blast radius gain 70 Protection. These effects last 10 seconds and can stack up to 10 times.

rGjz.Name: Fatal Funnel
rGjz.Description: Your mastery of "CQC" allows you to deal with crowds more effectively. Enemies within <font color='#FF6600'>5 </font> metres of the target are also fully affected by this ability. Additionally, any target who is successfully interrupted by this attack is dealt <font color='#FF3D3D'>%0.0f </font> physical damage.

tGjz.Name: Stand Firm
tGjz.Description: When using "Kneecapper" your sturdy footing allows you to improve the duration of the effect to <font color='#FF6600'>10 </font> seconds. In addition, the bonus granted is always the maximum possible, regardless of the number of shells consumed, and when you are glanced gain <font color='#FF6600'>26300 </font> Protection for <font color='#FF6600'>5 </font> seconds.

KGjz.Name: Odds and Evens
KGjz.Description: When you have an odd number of shells loaded, your Shotgun basic abilities deal <font color='#FF6600'>70% </font> more damage. When you have an even number of shells loaded, your Shotgun power abilities deal <font color='#FF6600'>15% </font> more damage.

OGjz.Name: Munitions Expert
OGjz.Description:
You are an expert with all manner of munitions, allowing you to have more opportunities to load Dragon's Breath Shells, Depleted Uranium Shells, and Armor-Piercing Shells.

At 51% or higher Survivability allocation, your chance to load Anima-Infused Shells and Armor-Piercing Shells is instead increased, and Armor-Piercing Shells apply Debilitated instead of Exposed.

PGjz.Name: Deflecting Anima
PGjz.Description: When you load Anima-Infused Shells into your shotgun, you disperse an invisible protective shield of anima that increases the chance for attacks to glance you by <font color='#FF6600'>10.0% </font> for <font color='#FF6600'>8 </font> seconds.

RGjz.Name: Riot Shield
RGjz.Description: Whenever you reload your Shotgun, you gather your resolve and shield yourself. For the next <font color='#FF6600'>4 </font> seconds, your Protection is increased by <font color='#FF6600'>1550 </font>.

0Hjz.Name: Enrich
0Hjz.Description: Whenever you load Depleted Uranium Shells, you feed in <font color='#FF6600'>2 </font> extra shells.

bHjz.Name: Combat Reload
bHjz.Description: While in combat, if you still have shells loaded in your shotgun, you load an additional shell every <font color='#FF6600'>5 </font> seconds.

mHjz.Name: Anima Coating
mHjz.Description:
Whenever an attack glances you, you store a small portion of the excess anima. When 13 attacks have glanced you, the next time you reload your shells will be coated with anima, healing for 2% of your missing health each time you hit and increasing all healing received by 4% .
This triggers effects related to loading Anima-Infused Shells.

qHjz.Name: White Phosphorus Shells
qHjz.Description: Pack additional incendiaries into your Dragon's Breath Shells, improving the damage they deal by <font color='#FF6600'>14% </font>.

yZCo.Name: Controlled Shooting
yZCo.Description:
Chain: Jumps up to 8 metres 5 times, hitting up to 6 enemies.

Consumes 3 Pistol Energy.
Fire your shot at your target in such a way that it rolls through them and nearby enemies. Affected targets are dealt %0.0f physical damage.

ZJDo.Name: Trick Shot
ZJDo.Description:
TAoE: Affects up to 6 enemies in a 5 metre radius around the target.

Consumes 4 Pistol Energy.
Fire a pair of swirling bullets at your target. The bullets explode on impact dealing %0.0f physical damage to the target and nearby enemies. Applies Exposed. Applies Debilitated.

CCDo.Name: Unload
CCDo.Description:
Channelled: Every 0.5 seconds for 2.5 seconds.

Consumes 5 Pistol Energy.
Empty the clips of both of your pistols into your target, dealing %0.0f physical damage per hit.

8Yuq.Name: All In
8Yuq.Description:
Channelled: Every 0.3 seconds for 3 seconds.

Consumes 4 Pistol Energy.
Unleash an all-out hail of fire at your target.
  •First 3 hits: %0.0f physical damage.

  •Next 3 hits: %0.0f physical damage.

  •Next 3 hits: %0.0f physical damage in a 5 metre area around the target.

  •Final hit: %0.0f physical damage.

5Yuq.Name: Dual Shot
5Yuq.Description:
Consumes 3 Pistol Energy.
Charge up and simultaneously fire both of your pistols at your target dealing %0.0f physical damage.

eYuq.Name: Kill Blind
eYuq.Description:
Consumes 2 Pistol Energy.
Raise the odds of killing your target by stunning and shooting them with each pistol. The shot deals %0.0f physical damage and extends the duration of any active matched chamber damage bonus by 1.5 seconds. Applies Exposed. Applies Debilitated.

cYuq.Name: Flourish
cYuq.Description: Spin your pistols and ready yourself for action, allowing you to recover <font color='#FF6600'>4 </font> Pistol Energy and cleanse yourself of <font color='#FF6600'>1 </font> detrimental effect. This ability does not trigger and is not affected by global recharge time.

mYuq.Name: Bullet Ballet
mYuq.Description:
Channelled: Every 0.2 seconds for 2 seconds.
PBAoE: Affects up to 6 enemies in a 10 metre radius around you.

Consumes 4 Pistol Energy.
In an exquisite display of gunmanship, fire a rapid succession of shots at all nearby targets dealing %0.0f physical damage per hit and slowing their movement.
You are unable to move while channeling this ability.

kYuq.Name: Charged Blast
kYuq.Description:
TAoE: Affects up to 5 enemies in a 6 metre radius around the target.

Consumes 5 Pistol Energy.
Send a wave of volatile energy through the ground towards your target. The energy detonates upon arrival dealing %0.0f physical damage to the target and nearby enemies.

gYuq.Name: Seeking Bullet
gYuq.Description:
Chain: Jumps up to 8 metres 5 times, hitting up to 6 enemies.

Fire shots from your pistols that seek out and damage enemies for %0.0f physical damage.

Requires Pistols in your Primary Weapon slot.

nYuq.Name: Hair Trigger
nYuq.Description:
Snap a quick shot at your target with your pistol, dealing %0.0f physical damage.

Requires Pistols in your Primary Weapon slot.

IYuq.Name: Clean Slate
IYuq.Description:
Consumes 2 Pistol Energy.
Channel your energy for restorative purposes, cleansing yourself and all group members of 3 detrimental effects and healing them for %0.0f . The amount healed increases based on your Attack Rating.

1=lz.Name: Full House
1=lz.Description:
Consumes 2 Pistol Energy.
Defy the odds and twist fate into forcing your pistol chambers to a Double Blue set for 3 seconds. This ability does not trigger and is not affected by global recharge time.

u=lz.Name: Six Line
u=lz.Description:
Consumes 2 Pistol Energy.
Take a chance and set your left pistol chamber to red for 6 seconds. During this time, all of your pistol attacks deal an additional %0.0f physical damage. This ability does not trigger and is not affected by global recharge time.

f0mz.Name: Ricochet
f0mz.Description:
Consumes 2 Pistol Energy.
Your mastery of angles and trajectories allows you to ricochet your bullets from one target to another for 6 seconds. Your target and nearby enemies are dealt an additional %0.0f physical damage whenever you deal damage with Pistol abilities. This ability does not trigger and is not affected by global recharge time.

F7mz.Name: Second Wind
F7mz.Description: When your chambers land on a matching set you are energized, restoring <font color='#00FF33'>3.5% </font> of your maximum health (up to <font color='#00FF33'>525 </font>).

z0mz.Name: High Roller
z0mz.Description: Your "Controlled Shooting" rolls through enemies and becomes even stronger for each enemy it hits, increasing the base damage by <font color='#FF6600'>10% </font> on each successive enemy.

W0mz.Name: Lethal Aim
W0mz.Description: Your "Flourish" allows you focus your aim to deadly effect. For the next <font color='#FF6600'>6 </font> seconds after use, your Pistol abilites deal <font color='#FF6600'>15% </font> more damage and cannot be evaded or glance.

12mz.Name: Holdout
12mz.Description: You hold out as long as you can when you finish using "Unload," granting you a <font color='#FF6600'>33% </font> chance to not spin your chambers if you already have a matched set.

f2mz.Name: Royal Flush
f2mz.Description:
You know the best time to go "All In" causing this ability to have additional effects if you have a set of matching chambers.

  •Double White: The target and nearby enemies are dealt an additional %0.0f physical damage. Applies Exposed. Applies Debilitated.

  •Double Blue: The target and nearby enemies are dealt an additional %0.0f physical damage.

  •Double Red: The target and nearby enemies are dealt an additional %0.0f physical damage.

z2mz.Name: Stacked Deck
z2mz.Description: Stack the odds even further in your favor, increasing the duration of "Full House" to <font color='#FF6600'>5 </font> seconds.

B2mz.Name: Rehabilitation
B2mz.Description: Your "Clean Slate" helps your allies recover more efficiently. If "Clean Slate" cleanses an ally of a detrimental effect, the healing output is increased to <font color='#00FF33'>%0.0f </font>.

E2mz.Name: Mulligan
E2mz.Description: If you don't get a Double Red set during "Six Line" you get a second chance, resetting the cooldown.

U2mz.Name: Focused Fire
U2mz.Description: When you use "Kill Blind" you prepare for your next move. If you do not have a locked set of matching chambers, you gain a Double White set. Additionally, the damage of "Kill Blind" is increased to <font color='#FF3D3D'>%0.0f </font> physical damage.

Y2mz.Name: Bamboozle
Y2mz.Description:
Your "Trick Shot" disables and confuses the enemies it damages causing them to become stunned, rooted, or snared. "Trick Shot" also purges 1 beneficial effect from all targets.
Stunned enemies take an additional %0.0f physical damage when they are damaged by you or your allies.
Rooted enemies are dealt %0.0f physical damage when the root effect expires.
Snared enemies and other enemies near them are dealt %0.0f physical damage every second.

Against enemies immune to crowd control, one damaging effect is chosen at random.

26mz.Name: Fatal Shot
26mz.Description: Your critical hits with "Dual Shot" are more potent, dealing an additional <font color='#FF3D3D'>%0.0f </font> physical damage.

h6mz.Name: Blast Crater
h6mz.Description: Your "Charged Blast" detonation is so powerful it cause enemies who remain in the blast radius to take <font color='#FF3D3D'>%0.0f </font> physical damage every second they remain in the area. Enemies damaged by this effect have their movement speed slowed.

d7mz.Name: Bullet Echo
d7mz.Description: When your "Ricochet" expires you retain traces of the bounding energy for <font color='#FF6600'>4 </font> seconds, causing your Pistol attacks to chain to nearby enemies dealing <font color='#FF3D3D'>%0.0f </font> physical damage.

s7mz.Name: Deadly Dance
s7mz.Description: As you execute your "Bullet Ballet" your bullets follow your lead and dance from target to target, dealing an additional <font color='#FF3D3D'>%0.0f </font> physical damage.

L8mz.Name: Fully Loaded
L8mz.Description: When your Pistol Energy reaches its maximum, you ready yourself for a fight. Whenever your Pistol Energy reaches <font color='#FF6600'>15 </font> you are automatically given a Double White match if you do not already have a match.

H9mz.Name: Double Down
H9mz.Description: You double down on your Pistol Power Abilities with great intensity. After using a Pistol Power Ability on a target you mark them, causing subsequent Pistol abilities to deal an additional <font color='#FF3D3D'>%0.0f - %0.0f </font> physical damage. The amount of damage increases the longer the target has been marked. Each mark lasts <font color='#FF6600'>8 </font> seconds and only one target can be marked at a time.

Famz.Name: Beginner's Luck
Famz.Description: <descripton>You instinctively know the best first approach to a target, causing your Pistol abilities to deal an additional <font color='#FF3D3D'>%0.0f - %0.0f </font> physical damage. The damage dealt is at its highest when the target is at maximum health.

Kamz.Name: Jackpot
Kamz.Description: Lady luck smiles on you. Whenever you land on a matching set of chambers, you gain a beneficial effect which causes your Pistol attacks to deal an additional <font color='#FF3D3D'>%0.0f </font> physical damage for <font color='#FF6600'>3 </font> seconds.

Wdmz.Name: Flechette Rounds
Wdmz.Description: When you have a matching set of chambers, your bullets from your Pistol attacks splinter off and inflict <font color='#FF3D3D'>%0.0f </font> physical damage to nearby enemies.

ovmz.Name: Win Streak
ovmz.Description: When you win, you keep on winning. Whenever you deal bonus damage from a matched set of chambers, you deal an additional <font color='#FF3D3D'>%0.0f - %0.0f </font> physical damage. The damage dealt increases with each consecutive bonus damage hit.

Gemz.Name: Heavy Caliber Rounds
Gemz.Description:
Your bullets pack an additional punch. Whenever you have a matching set of chambers, the bonus damage dealt is increased.

  •Double White: Damage increased by 28% .

  •Double Blue: Damage increased by 14.5% .

  •Double Red: Damage increased by 9% .

Temz.Name: Fixed Game
Temz.Description: You take the time to rig the game in your favor. If you haven't used a Pistol Ability in the last <font color='#FF6600'>4 </font> seconds, your right chamber is set to match your left chamber.

Y7lo.Name: Full Auto
Y7lo.Description:
TAoE: Affects up to 6 enemies in a 5 metre radius around the target.

Consumes 3 Assault Rifle Energy.
Unload a hail of bullets at your target and nearby enemies. Affected targets are hit 4 times for %0.0f physical damage each time.

You have a low chance to load a grenade when using this ability. You will load about 6 grenades per minute with base energy generation.

X8lo.Name: High Explosive Grenade
X8lo.Description:
TAoE: Affects up to 6 enemies in a 5 metre radius around the target.

Consumes 4 Assault Rifle Energy.
Blast the target and nearby enemies with a powerful high explosive grenade dealing %0.0f physical damage. Applies Debilitated and affected targets are stunned for 3 seconds. Also the area at the targeted point erupts into flames that last 8 seconds. Every second it will deal %0.0f physical damage to up to 6 enemies in a 5 metre radius.
If the grenade is fully cooked before launch, the initial blast's damage is improved to %0.0f physical damage.

Requires a grenade to activate.

l7lo.Name: Lock & Load
l7lo.Description: Harness your energy and gain <font color='#FF6600'>4 </font> Assault Rifle Energy. This ability does not trigger and is not affected by global recharge time.

fLZp.Name: Burst Fire
fLZp.Description:
Consumes 5 Assault Rifle Energy.
Switch your rifle to burst mode and fire at your target, hitting 3 times, dealing %0.0f physical damage per hit.

You have a high chance to load a grenade when using this ability. You will load about 6 grenades per minute with base energy generation.

sb+p.Name: Placed Shot
sb+p.Description:
Take aim and fire a single shot at your target dealing %0.0f physical damage.

Requires an Assault Rifle in your Primary Weapon slot.

Ij+p.Name: Red Mist
Ij+p.Description:
Consumes 4 Assault Rifle Energy.
Take aim at your target and fire a powerful shot at their vitals dealing %0.0f physical damage and slowing its movement.

sM8q.Name: Tactical Retreat
sM8q.Description:
Column Dash: Dash backward 5 metres.

Consumes 2 Assault Rifle Energy.
Put some distance between you and your enemies by quickly moving backwards.
If you have a grenade, the dash distance is increased to 10 metres and the cooldown time is reduced to 4 seconds. This cooldown reduction can only happen once every 15 seconds.

The grenade is left at the start location, exploding 1 second after the dash, affecting up to 6 enemies and dealing %0.0f physical damage in an area around it. Affected targets have their movement speed slowed by 70% for 4 seconds.
If the grenade is fully cooked before the dash, the damage dealt is improved to %0.0f physical damage.

VO+p.Name: Incendiary Grenade
VO+p.Description:
TAoE: Affects up to 6 enemies in a 5 metre radius around your target.

Consumes 2 Assault Rifle Energy.
Launch a grenade filled with a highly potent mixture of thermite and anima dealing %0.0f physical damage and %0.0f damage every second for 8 seconds to the primary target and %0.0f physical damage and %0.0f damage every second for 8 seconds to other enemies in the targeted area. Affected targets are purged of 1 beneficial effect.
If the grenade is fully cooked before launch, the initial damage is improved to %0.0f / %0.0f physical damage and the damage over time effect is improved to deal %0.0f / %0.0f physical damage every second.

Requires a grenade to activate.

+f5q.Name: Leeching Ray
+f5q.Description:
Sap your target's energy with an enervating beam of energy from your rifle. This attack hits 3 times, dealing %0.0f physical damage per hit. A portion of the stolen energy heals your defensive target for %0.0f , and seeks out and heals the member of your group with the lowest percentage remaining health for the same amount.

If your Anima Allocation is at least 51% Healing, you have a very low chance to load a grenade when using this ability, this ability cannot glance, and will not damage a target that has a dungeon reflect shield active.

Requires an Assault Rifle in your Primary Weapon slot.

3g5q.Name: Vital Shot
3g5q.Description:
Consumes 6 Assault Rifle Energy.
Fire a draining blast of energy at your target dealing %0.0f physical damage. The drained energy heals your defensive target for %0.0f and additionally for %0.1f% of the damage dealt.

If your Anima Allocation is at least 51% Healing, this ability cannot glance, and when your target has a dungeon reflect shield active it will not damage the target and will instead heal your defensive target for %0.0f .

When used to heal yourself, the amount healed is increased by 300% .

You have a low chance to load a grenade when using this ability. You will load about 6 grenades per minute with base energy generation.

6g5q.Name: Anima Suffusion
6g5q.Description:
Channelled: Every 0.3 seconds for 1.5 seconds.

Consumes 4 Assault Rifle Energy.
Infuse the target's entire being with anima, healing them for %0.0f each interval. While channeling this ability and for 2.5 seconds after, your target is unable to be killed. When this ability finishes channeling, you gain a beneficial effect which increases the effectiveness of all Assault Rifle healing abilities by 35% for 4 seconds.

ko+p.Name: Energise
ko+p.Description:
Consumes 2 Assault Rifle Energy.
Tap into your inner energy, increasing the effectiveness of all Assault Rifle healing abilities by 24% for 6 seconds.

Additionally, your next Assault Rifle attack purges 1 beneficial effect from each target hit.



This ability does not trigger and is not affected by global recharge time.

lo+p.Name: Anima Canister
lo+p.Description:
Consumes 2 Assault Rifle Energy.
Launch a canister of revitalizing anima at your defensive target healing them for %0.0f . The healing energies also spread to your group, healing all group members for %0.0f .
If the grenade is fully cooked before launch, the defensive target healing is improved to %0.0f and the group healing is improved to %0.0f .

Requires a grenade to activate.

EP+p.Name: Essence Grenades
EP+p.Description:
TAoE: Affects up to 6 enemies and allies in a 5 metre radius around your target.

Consumes 2 Assault Rifle Energy.
Launch a pair of grenades at the target, each one exploding in a burst of energy. One grenade deals %0.0f physical damage to the primary target, and %0.0f physical damage to other enemies in the targeted area. Applies Debilitated to all damaged enemies. The other grenade heals friendly targets for %0.0f .
If the grenade is fully cooked before launch, the damage is improved to %0.0f / %0.0f physical damage and the healing is improved to %0.0f .

Requires a grenade to activate.

pg5q.Name: Unveil Essence
pg5q.Description:
Consumes 10 Assault Rifle Energy.
Fire a bolt of energy at the target, revealing their inner essence for all to see. The target is dealt %0.0f physical damage and your group is healed for %0.0f . The target's essence becomes available for your group to steal for 6 seconds causing group members who attacks them to be healed for %0.1f% of the damage dealt.

If your Anima Allocation is at least 51% Healing, this ability cannot glance, and when your target has a dungeon reflect shield active it will not damage the target and will instead heal your group for %0.0f .

You have a high chance to load a grenade when using this ability. You will load about 6 grenades per minute with base energy generation.

yZjz.Name: Extended Magazine
yZjz.Description: An extended magazine allows you to fire more shots when you use "Full Auto," increasing the number of hits to <font color='#FF6600'>5 </font>.

n=jz.Name: Heavy Payload
n=jz.Description: You keep your explosives at the ready. When you use "Lock & Load" you have a <font color='#FF6600'>41% </font> to load a grenade.

X=jz.Name: Stability
X=jz.Description: You keep your aim steady when using "Burst Fire," causing each successive hit to deal <font color='#FF6600'>25% </font> more base damage.

B+jz.Name: Unerring Accuracy
B+jz.Description: Your "Red Mist" always hits its mark. This ability can no longer glance or be evaded and critical hits deal <font color='#FF6600'>68% </font> more damage.

R0kz.Name: Slow Burn
R0kz.Description: Your "Incendiary Grenade" is loaded with slower burning, longer lasting fuel, increasing the duration to <font color='#FF6600'>10 </font> seconds.

52kz.Name: Synergy
52kz.Description: Your "Anima Canister" weaves miniscule threads of anima connecting everyone it affects. Whenever you heal anyone who received healing from your "Anima Canister", that healing energy synergizes and provides <font color='#00FF33'>%0.0f </font> healing to the "Anima Canister's" primary target. This effect lasts for <font color='#FF6600'>5 </font> seconds after you cast "Anima Canister", and can trigger up to <font color='#FF6600'>5 </font> times per second.

w1kz.Name: Withdrawal
w1kz.Description: Your "Tactical Retreat" grants you better positioning. When used you always dash <font color='#FF6600'>10 </font> metres. In addition, when you leave a grenade the damage is increased to <font color='#FF3D3D'>%0.0f </font> physical damage or <font color='#FF3D3D'>%0.0f </font> physical damage for fully cooked grenades.

V0kz.Name: Lingering Essence
V0kz.Description: Your "Essence Grenades" leave a lingering mist of restorative energy, healing allies in the area for <font color='#00FF33'>%0.0f </font> every second for <font color='#FF6600'>5 </font> seconds.

n2kz.Name: Auto-loader
n2kz.Description: After launching your "High Explosive Grenade" your auto-loader kicks in, causing your next grenade generating ability to have a <font color='#FF6600'>40% </font> chance to load a grenade.

x+jz.Name: Bolstering Shot
x+jz.Description: Your "Vital Shot" bolsters your ally's energy, causing them to draw strength from their foes. For the next <font color='#FF6600'>4 </font> seconds after being healed by this ability, your defensive target gains a beneficial effect which causes their attacks to restore their health.

o4kz.Name: Reap Essence
o4kz.Description: "Unveil Essence" reveals even more energy for your allies to reap. Whenever an attack critically hits a target affected by your "Unveil Essence" the attacker is instead healed for <font color='#00FF33'>%0.1f% </font> of the damage they dealt.

q4kz.Name: Vivify
q4kz.Description: When you use "Energise" you awaken the latent energy in your group members. For the next <font color='#FF6600'>5 </font> seconds, all healing effects on your group members are <font color='#FF6600'>5% </font> more effective.

y4kz.Name: Permeate
y4kz.Description: After using "Anima Suffusion" your target is left imbued with some anima residue, granting a beneficial effect for <font color='#FF6600'>4 </font> seconds which increases the amount of healing received by <font color='#00FF33'>30% </font>.

x5kz.Name: Anima-Tipped Bullets
x5kz.Description: Your bullets are infused with anima energy causing each Assault Rifle shot to heal you for <font color='#00FF33'>4% </font> of the damage dealt.

Jckz.Name: Explosives Expert
Jckz.Description: Your skill with explosives allows you to increase the fuse time on your grenades to <font color='#FF6600'>9 </font> seconds. Also, your grenades are now fully cooked when they have <font color='#FF6600'>7 </font> seconds remaining before detonating. If a grenade detonates before you are able to launch it, you are no longer harmed by the blast and nearby enemies are dealt <font color='#FF3D3D'>%0.0f </font> physical damage.

tekz.Name: Field Medic
tekz.Description: Your presence empowers the restorative effects of your Assault Rifle abilities. If you are within <font color='#FF6600'>7 </font> metres of your defensive target when healing with your Assault Rifle, they are healed for an additional <font color='#00FF33'>%0.0f </font>.

+ekz.Name: Jungle Style
+ekz.Description: You come prepared with extra ammunition. Whenever you run out of Assault Rifle Energy, you gain <font color='#FF6600'>1 </font> Assault Rifle Energy.

Efkz.Name: Anima Dispersal
Efkz.Description: Whenever you launch a grenade, you harness some of the expended energy into restorative power. For the next <font color='#FF6600'>5 </font> seconds, all of your healing and leeching effects are <font color='#FF6600'>6.5% </font> more effective.

Ifkz.Name: Anima Stasis
Ifkz.Description:
Whenever a grenade would detonate while still loaded into your assualt rifle, a small anima-powered failsafe activates and purges the explosive from the grenade, replacing it with restorative anima. The grenade is held in stasis and can be launched by "Anima Canister" or "Essence Grenades". When these abilities launch a grenade held in stasis, the damage dealt is reduced by 75% and healing done is increased by 66% .

Only 1 grenade can be held in stasis. "Anima Canister" and "Essence Grenades" prioritise launching the grenade held in stasis when the loaded grenade is uncooked.

When you enter combat, you generate 1 grenade immediately held in stasis.

Lfkz.Name: Secondary Explosion
Lfkz.Description: You pack additional timed explosives into your grenade abilities. These explosives detonate <font color='#FF6600'>1.5 </font> seconds after you launch your grenade dealing <font color='#FF3D3D'>%0.0f </font> physical damage to enemies within <font color='#FF6600'>2 </font> metres of the original target.

Zfkz.Name: Overclocked Loader
Zfkz.Description: Your experience with volatile explosives enables you to overclock your grenade loader. On average, you will load <font color='#FF6600'>1.2 </font> additional grenades per minute.

0gkz.Name: Combat Readiness
0gkz.Description: You are always ready to react to an ever-changing battlefield. While you have an uncooked grenade loaded, the damage and healing of your Assault Rifle basic abilities is increased by <font color='#FF6600'>20% </font>.
